item.title: My Number One Goal for 2024 | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Discover the key to achieving your goals and creating the life you want in today’s video! Join me as I share my number one goal for the next three years and how it has transformed my perspective on saying yes and no. Transcript

item.title: How to Build Momentum and Consistency | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Do you struggle with staying consistent in your daily routine? Don’t worry, we’ve got you covered! In today’s video, we’ll share the secrets to building momentum and creating lasting change in your life. Get ready to unlock your full potential and achieve the success you deserve. Transcript

item.title: How To Have Massive Growth in 2024 | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description It’s time to break free and unleash your full potential! In this video, we’ll explore the concept of applied suffering and how it can transform your life. As the year comes to an end, now is the perfect time to start implementing this powerful strategy and set yourself up for success in 2024. Get ready to embrace the discomfort. Transcript

item.title: The Power of Being a Morning Person | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Today, I have the privilege of sitting down with none other than my good buddy and incredible author, Hal Elrod. We’re diving deep into the world of mornings and discussing his bestseller, “The Miracle Morning,” which has sold over 2 million copies! Back in the day, I actually hired Hal as my coach, and he’s been a game-changer in my life. His book, “The Miracle Morning,” is like the OG of morning routines, and it’s been transforming lives for over a decade.

item.title: Level Up Your Life in 2024 | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description You know that if you want 2024 to be the best year of your life, nothing will change unless YOU change right? Well if you‚Äôre ready to change, join my LevelUp30 Challenge here: http://levelup30.com/ I am running a 30-day challenge starting January 2nd that is designed to challenge you and hold you accountable so that you create breakthroughs in your mindset and life. No more of this new year, new me BS with no real action.

item.title: Transform Your Life with the Misogi Challenge | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Discover the extraordinary possibilities that await when you dare to step outside your comfort zone. Join us as we delve into the ancient wisdom of a Japanese technique that holds the key to reshaping your very being. Through this profound practice, we will guide you in shedding the layers of negativity and self-doubt, empowering you to tap into your true potential. Brace yourself for a mind-expanding experience as we unveil the hidden treasures within this life-altering methodology.

item.title: 5 Ways to Bring Out the Best in People | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Being a leader means more than just giving orders. It means inspiring and bringing out the best in your team. In this video, we’ll share the five most effective ways to unleash the full potential of the people you work with. From communication techniques to fostering a positive environment, these strategies will help you create a high-performing team. Transcript

item.title: Where you‚Äôre messing up in your self development. | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Looking for a way to make your life easier and less stressful? Look no further! In this video, I’ll be sharing a game-changing secret that will transform the way you approach success. Life can be tough, but with this powerful strategy, you’ll be able to overcome any obstacle and achieve the life you’ve always dreamed of. Transcript

item.title: Why did nobody teach us this? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Ever wondered why we were never taught the art of self-soothing as children? In this episode, we explore the reasons behind this oversight and unveil the secrets to attaining a greater sense of calm and serenity. Say goodbye to overwhelming emotions and hello to a more centered, less anxious version of yourself. This episode is sponsored by Inside Tracker. Go to https://insidetracker.com and use the promo code: mindsetmentor for 20% off today.

item.title: The Truth About Happiness | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Do you ever wish you could wake up every day feeling happy and at peace? In today’s video, we’ll be discussing how to achieve more peace and happiness in your life. Say goodbye to the negative voice in your head and the people who drive you crazy, and say hello to a blissful state of mind. Find out how to create your own version of heaven on earth by listening to this episode.

item.title: The thing that controls your mind. | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Discover the hidden power that influences your thoughts, emotions, and actions in ways you never imagined. Join us as we delve into the fascinating world of subconscious mind control and uncover the secrets to creating the life you truly desire. Transcript

item.title: How to Manage Your Stress | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Not all stress is created equal, and in this video, we break down the three different types of stress that exist in your life. You’ll gain a deeper understanding of how each type affects you and how you can leverage stress to your advantage. Get ready to transform your relationship with stress and unlock your true potential. Transcript

item.title: Master Your Mindset: Conquering the Fear of Failure | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Failure is a normal part of the learning process. But it can be paralyzing if you let it be. In this video, I’ll share with you the mindset change strategies that have helped me overcome the fear of failure. By implementing these strategies into your life, you’ll be able to successfully overcome the fear of failure and become a more successful individual! Transcript

item.title: Improve Your Mental Health & Productivity | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Today, we’re not just talking about your regular to-do lists (though they’re great too!). I’m introducing you to the game-changer: Anti-To-Do Lists! üôÖ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Yes, you heard that right. This isn’t about piling more tasks on your plate. It’s about identifying and cutting out the habits and tasks that aren’t serving you. Imagine decluttering your mental space and energy ‚Äì that’s what we’re aiming for! Here’s the deal: Anti-To-Do Lists help you pinpoint what to avoid, like endless social media scrolling or hitting that snooze button (we’ve all been there, right?

item.title: A Simple Path To Peace | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Today we’re embarking on a transformative journey into the world of forgiveness. Picture this: deep down, each of us is a wellspring of goodness. Life, with its twists and turns, can sometimes cloud this inner light, but it never truly fades away. It’s waiting to shine through, and I’m here to help you rediscover it. Think about it - holding onto anger and resentment, it’s like letting poison seep into your soul.

item.title: A Simple Secret to Personal Development: How to Be Consistent | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description This episode is all about the power of consistency and how it can dramatically shift the course of your life. It’s simple, but not easy, and that’s why it’s such a game-changer! I’ll share insights on: 1Ô∏è‚É£ The magic of doing one thing every day to transform your habits and life direction. 2Ô∏è‚É£ The concept of a ‘Keystone Habit’ and how it can positively affect various aspects of your life.

item.title: Interview with a Licensed Therapist: Understanding Anxiety | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Get ready for an insightful journey in our latest podcast episode featuring the amazing Haesue Jo, a licensed therapist from BetterHelp. In this episode, we explore the complex world of anxiety with Haesue’s expert guidance. She brings her therapeutic wisdom to the table, helping us unravel the intricacies of anxiety and its impact on our lives. This is a must-listen for anyone looking to understand anxiety better, whether you’re experiencing it firsthand or supporting someone who is.

item.title: Get Aggressive For the Life You Want | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Are you tired of just going through the motions in life? In this episode i’ll show you how to get aggressive and take control of your destiny. No more sitting on the sidelines and watching life pass you by. It’s time to set goals, meditate, and invest in your personal growth. Start living your best life today! Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description In this episode, we’ll dive into practical and transformative strategies that’ll elevate your productivity and sharpen your focus like never before. Whether you’re struggling to keep up with your to-do list or just looking for that extra edge in your daily routine, this episode is packed with valuable insights and easy-to-implement tips. üìà Key points we cover include: Time-Management Techniques That Actually Work Mindfulness Practices for Enhanced Concentration The Power of Goal Setting and How to Do It Effectively Leveraging Technology for Better Productivity Plus, I share some personal anecdotes and experiences that have shaped my approach to productivity and focus.

item.title: The 6 Biggest Decisions You‚Äôll Make In Your Life | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description In this episode, we’re diving deep into those crucial choices that shape our lives. item.description: Podcast Description Are you drowning in a sea of responsibilities and gadgets? item.description: Podcast Description Discover the truth about positive thinking in today’s episode of The Mindset Mentor Podcast. I’m here to debunk the myth and provide you with scientific and psychological studies that prove why positive thinking may not be working for you. Transcript

item.title: How To Get Rid Of Your Scarcity Mindset | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Are you tired of feeling like there’s never enough? ü§î Whether it’s time, money, or opportunities, that nagging sense of scarcity can really hold us back. But guess what? It doesn’t have to be this way! Join me as we dive deep into transforming our thoughts from scarcity to abundance. üöÄ In this episode, we’re going to uncover: ‚ú® The hidden triggers of a scarcity mindset ‚ú® Practical steps to embrace an abundance mentality ‚ú® Real-life stories of people who’ve made the switch

item.title: How To Step Into Your Power | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description In this episode, we dive into what it means to truly own your strength and potential. You’ll learn practical tips and strategies to unlock your inner power and transform your life. We’re talking about overcoming fears, embracing your unique qualities, and making impactful decisions. item.title: Are any of your memories real? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Have you ever wondered how accurate your memories are? ü§î Well, you’re not alone! In this episode, we’ll explore the fascinating world of memory. I’m bringing you the latest research and some mind-blowing studies to show just how our memories are formed and sometimes reconstructed. Plus, I’ll share some personal anecdotes and tips on how to critically analyze and understand your memories better.

item.title: Listen To This Everyday - Affirmations for Success | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description You know, I totally get it ‚Äì affirmations might seem a bit woo-woo or out there. We’ll explore how the words you use, not just with others but within your own mind, have the power to transform your perception of yourself and the world around you. item.title: 4 Science Backed Ways to Better Mental Health | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description In this episode, we’re diving deep into something that’s super close to my heart: Mental Health. üß† Studies are showing that nearly 20% of adults in the US are dealing with various mental health challenges, and I’m all in to help you through it. item.description: Podcast Description It’s time to shift your focus and embrace the future you want to create! In this video, we’ll discuss why living in the past can hold you back from reaching your full potential and how to redirect your energy towards a more empowered future. Learn how to let go of past experiences, both good and bad, and start manifesting the life you truly deserve. Transcript

item.title: Harness Your Mind's Power: The Placebo Effect and Self-Healing | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Get ready to delve into the fascinating world of your thoughts, as I reveal the keys to understanding and mastering your mind. From uncovering your weaknesses to overcoming mental traps, this podcast will empower you to take control of your thoughts and create the life you desire. Transcript

item.title: Unlock Your Potential: Overcoming Self-Limiting Beliefs for Success | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description In today’s episode, we explore the power of overcoming limitations and how they can actually propel you towards greatness. Get ready to unleash your true potential and achieve the success you deserve! Transcript

item.title: 9 Things To Stop Doing Right Now! | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Tired of making excuses and ready to take control of your life? Today I’m sharing the nine things you need to stop doing right now. item.description: Podcast Description I’m excited to bring you another episode that’s going to make you think! item.title: Who is your future self? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Today, we’re diving deep into a topic that’s often overlooked but holds the key to achieving your goals and creating the life you’ve always dreamed of. item.description: Podcast Description In this episode, we’re tackling a question as old as humanity itself: What is the meaning of life? We will dive into various philosophies, personal anecdotes, and scientific perspectives to shed light on this profound question. We’ll explore how the meaning of life isn’t a one-size-fits-all answer, but a deeply personal journey of discovery and understanding. Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Today, we’re diving deep into a topic that’s been highly requested: Confidence. üí™ In this video, we’re breaking down the step-by-step process to mastering confidence. item.description: Podcast Description Today I’m going to reveal a game-changing strategy to conquer anxious thinking. Learn how to break free from the cycle of rumination and find peace of mind. If you’re tired of being stuck in anxious thoughts, this episode is a must-listen! Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description In today’s episode, we’re delving into a topic that can transform your productivity game forever - “7 Habits To Make You More Productive.” üöÄ Ever felt like you’ve been hustling all day but not achieving your desired results? item.description: Podcast Description Welcome to today‚Äôs episode of The Mindset Mentor Podcast, where today‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm going to share with you what I believe is the best possible thing you could do for your future, starting today. item.description: Podcast Description If you really want to change the quality of peace you‚Äôre feeling in your present moment, immediately‚Ä¶ This is the episode for you today! item.description: Podcast Description Affirmations are simple, but the effects are profound. Welcome to today‚Äôs episode of The Mindset Mentor Podcast where today we are diving deep into the transformative power of self-awareness and how it can actually be the ultimate superpower.

item.description: Podcast Description Today, we’re diving deep into a topic that’s all about helping you achieve your goals and build habits that last. item.description: Podcast Description Today I‚Äôm going to talk to you about a very simple strategy that anyone can follow, to quickly start achieving their goals. item.title: Time Management Hacks: How To Be More Productive | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description After coaching thousands of business owners and other high-achieving people over the past 10 years, time management seems to be the biggest cop-out that most people shoot out when trying to explain why they‚Äôre not seeing the results in their life that they want. item.description: Podcast Description The great purge is all about doing a deep cleanse of your mind, your relationships, and your environment‚Ä¶ and and the way you start this process is by simply looking at each of those things and asking yourself one question: ‚ÄúIs this serving me? Or is this stealing my energy?‚Äù But it‚Äôs not serving you, nor giving you energy, and is, in fact, sucking the energy from you‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm going to recommend you completely eliminate that thing from your life.

item.title: 5 Steps To Stop Being Lazy & Be More Motivated | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description In this episode, I’m going to share a 5-step roadmap to destroy your laziness and fuel your motivation engine. Which means‚Ä¶ If you‚Äôve sucked at time management in the past‚Ä¶ You can start changing that TODAY. item.title: Stop Mental Masturbation | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome to today‚Äôs episode of The Mindset Mentor Podcast, where today‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm going to teach you how to stop your mental masturbation. ‚ÄúWhoa, did I read that right?‚Äù… Yes you did.¬†What do I mean by mental masturbation? It‚Äôs the process of thinking, thinking, and overthinking about things that you want or need to do, but‚Ä¶ To the point where you do nothing at all. That‚Äôs why this is a problem.

item.title: 4 Ways To Improve Your Relationships | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome back to The Mindset Mentor Podcast. Today I‚Äôm sharing with the world what seems to be holding most of the people I talk to that are in bad relationships‚Ä¶ from having good relationships.¬†It may be no surprise to you that the main thing that causes people to struggle in their relationships whether we are talking about friendships, coworkers, family, or romantic relationships‚Ä¶ is communication. If you know that you could improve your communication, or if you‚Äôre in a relationship with someone that you think THEY are the one struggling to communicate‚Ä¶¬†I encourage you to listen to this episode today and see if there‚Äôs anything new you may learn about yourself, or maybe you‚Äôll uncover a stronger and better way to communicate with the person that seems to not be able to communicate with you.

item.title: 5 Keys To Stop Procrastinating | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome to today‚Äôs episode of The Mindset Mentor Podcast, where today‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm going to give you 5 keys to instantly stop procrastinating! This episode is for you if: You know that you are a frequent procrastinator and want to fix that. You‚Äôre simply a busy person that has a lot on their plate all the time and you‚Äôre ready to figure out the BEST ways to get more done in less time‚Ä¶¬†My goal with this episode is to help you STOP being lazy, STOP feeling unmotivated, and STOP procrastinating so frequently‚Ä¶ ‚Ä¶So that you can finally START achieving those goals you set for yourself.

item.title: Use your ego for good | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome back to The Mindset Mentor Podcast where today I‚Äôm going to uncover whether or not it‚Äôs possible to actually use our ego‚Äôs for good? We always here that having too big of an ego can be destructive to ourselves and others, but here‚Äôs what I think‚Ä¶¬†I think that we can actually take our ego and it for good and instead of being Negative and Destructive‚Ä¶ I believe that we can actually use them to be Positive and Constructive.

item.title: How To Have More Self Love | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Today I‚Äôm going to talk about how to stop doing something that I hear so many people I talk to admit to doing that is self sabotaging you way more than you may even know‚Ä¶ So many people that are stuck in ruts, feeling unmotivated, lost, and like they just aren‚Äôt living to their full potential‚Ä¶ are also admitting to me that they talk negatively to themselves.¬†Sometimes that‚Äôs even disguised as trying to be ‚Äúreal‚Äù and honest with yourself‚Ä¶ but there is a very fine line when you‚Äôre stuck in a rut and feeling unmotivated or unloved, between negative self talk, and constructive self talk.

item.title: 7 Tips To Get Out Of A Rut | The Mindset Mentor

item.title: It Is Not Your Fault | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Your childhood experiences, whether good or bad, have a lasting impact on you. It’s essential to recognize that any trauma or adversity experienced during childhood is not your fault. These experiences are often the result of factors outside of your control. However, it’s also important to acknowledge that healing from these experiences is your responsibility. No one else can do the work for you, and it’s up to you to take the steps necessary to heal and move forward.

If you’re looking for ways to take control of your workload and reduce feelings of overwhelm, this podcast episode is a must-listen.

You’ll learn the importance of setting boundaries and prioritizing your own needs, as well as the role of self-care in building self-love.

In this podcast episode, we’ll be discussing the steps you can take to discover your purpose and live a life that truly feels meaningful to you.

In this podcast episode, we’ll be discussing the power of small, incremental improvements and how they can add up to significant and lasting change over time.

item.title: What You Put Out... | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 508 - What you put out in the world is what you will get back. So… what are you putting out? Transcript

item.title: Are You Working or Training? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 507 - Are you getting things done or planning on getting things done? Are you accomplishing your goals or studying about what you should do next? These seem like silly questions but they actually the difference between your success and thinking that you are working towards success when you are just standing still. Transcript

item.title: Do You Know What You Want? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 506 - After coaching thousands of people, I have found that one of the main reasons that people do not succeed is because they don’t know what they want. They have an idea but are not 100% clear on what it is. You have to realize, you will never hit a target that you cannot see. So, in this episode I will teach you how to get clear on your goals!

item.title: Make $100k This Year | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 505 - Want to learn how to make $100k? In this episode, I’ll teach you how! Transcript

item.title: Become The Dream You | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 504 - Who is it that you want to be in 10 years? What does that person look like? What are their habits? Who do they hang out with? These are all important questions that you need to answer in order to become the person that you want to be. In this episode, I dive into how to grow into the person in your dreams! Transcript

item.title: A 1 in 10,000 Chance | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 503 - In this episode, I will shift your perspective on success and what it takes to attain it. Success is not as hard as society makes it to be, sometimes it’s just a simple shift in your perspective and a simple shift in your habits. Transcript

item.title: It's Your Time! | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 502 - What if your life was a movie and right now was the time when you, the main character, decided to wake up and make a massive change in their life? What would be the next step your character would take? Today we are going to dive into that topic and talk about how to make a change right now! Transcript

item.title: Are You Living Up to Your Potential? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 501 - Why are you listening to this podcast? Is it because you feel like there is more for you in this world? You feel like you have more potential that you are not living up to? Well in this episode, we are going to talk about how to live up to your full potential! Transcript

item.title: Episode 500!!!! | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 500 - This is what I have learned in 500 episodes and how my life has completely changed since episode #1! Transcript

item.title: Major in the Majors | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 499 - Where your focus goes, your energy flows… so what are you focusing on every day? Is it the big stuff or is it the small stuff? Is is something that you will remember in 5-10 years? If not, why are you bothering yourself with it? In this episode, I teach you how to stop sweating the small stuff so that you can focus on the big things in your life.

item.title: Habits of The Most Successful People | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 498 - The easiest way to be successful is not to reinvent the wheel, it is to just model the most successful people. All you have to do is find out what they do, and then force yourself to do exactly the same thing. So in this episode, I teach the 5 most common habits of successful people. Transcript

item.title: Do it Over Again | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 497 - Buddhism says that the only guarantee in life is suffering, but what if we could go back and relive some of our toughest moments in our lives and see them in a different light? There has been proof that there is massive benefit in doing that and in this episode I will talk about how that is done! Transcript

item.title: The Heavyweight Champion of the World | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 496 - What is the difference between the Heavyweight Champion of the World and every other boxer? In this episode, I will dive into that topic! Transcript

item.title: Shoot with Your Eyes Closed | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 495 - Are you a planner? Does that planning get in the way of your execution, which means you get nothing done? In this episode, I am going to chat about how to stop thinking and just execute. Transcript

item.title: Life is Like a Puzzle | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 494 - In life sometimes we get what we want and sometimes we don’t. Either way, we should learn to arrange whatever pieces we get. To sit and complain about the pieces does not change anything. Therefore, we should get good at accepting life and using our skills to make our lives better. In this episode, I teach you how to do that. Transcript

item.title: Quit The Rat Race! | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 493 - Are you stuck in a job that you hate? Want to learn how and why to break free from it? Check out this episode! Transcript

item.title: How Much is Too Much? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 492 - Which is more important, money or happiness? Well, in this episode, I dive deep into that subject through a quick story that will help you put it all into perspective. Transcript

item.title: Not Enough Time? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 491 - Do you feel like you just don’t have enough time? Better yet, do you ever use the phrase “I don’t have time”? Well in this episode, I break down how that is completely false. We always have time for what matters. Listen to this episode and learn why! Transcript

item.title: The Law of 40% | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 490 - When you think you are done, you are no where near your capacity. There is way more left in the tank than you realize. In this episode, I share tips from the toughest man in the world so that you can reach your maximum potential. Transcript

item.title: That Little Voice in Your Head | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 489 - We all have that little voice in our head that holds us back from our dreams. If we listen to that voice, we will never be as great as we could be. In this episode, I talk about how to silence that voice so that you can live to your full potential. Transcript

item.title: How to Change Who You Are | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 488 - Who we are is really just a set of learn habits and patterns. 47% of the normal human’s day is unconscious patterns learned over their entire lives. So, how do we break the habits that are no longer serving us? I’ll explain that in this episode! Transcript

item.title: Break Your Routines | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 487 - We are all stuck in routines. Some of them are good and some of them are bad. In this episode, I talk about how to radically break through your routines and step into the person that you want to become. Transcript

item.title: Your Entire Life is This Way | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 486 - Have ever thought about how each thing that you do in your life has one common denominator? Or one guiding principle in all that you do? Check out this episode to understand what I am talking about… Transcript

item.title: Are You Full of Yourself? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 485 - Are you full of yourself? If you are, is that a problem? Society will tell you that it is a problem but I don’t believe that it is. Listen to this episode to learn why you and how should be full of yourself! Transcript

item.title: How Your Brain Affects Your Relationships | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 484 - This is a long one, but a GOOD one! In this episode, John Howard, an amazing relationship therapist, and I dive into how your first relationships as a child affect every relationship you will have the rest of your life. We have some deep psychological conversations and I guarantee you will learn a lot! Transcript

item.title: The Power of Vulnerability Pt 2 | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 483 - Now that we have talked about vulnerability and the benefits of it, it is time to talk about how to embrace it. This is especially important if you are in a committed relationship. If you have not listened to part one, you definitely need to listen to part one before listening to this episode! Transcript

item.title: The Power of Vulnerability Pt.1 | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 482 - Vulnerability is a strange thing. It is hard for us to be vulnerable and to open ourselves up to other people, yet it is the only thing that can build deep relationships. In this two part episode, I dive into the power of vulnerability and talk about why we need to learn to be more vulnerable. Transcript

item.title: Live Your Life NOW | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 481 - Are you living for the weekend? Are you waiting for the 2 days of the weekend throughout ever single week day? If you do, listen to this episode! Transcript

item.title: Do You Fear Dying? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 480 - One of the top fears in the world is the fear of death. Death is the one thing that we cannot outrun, it will happen no matter what. So why do we fear it? In this episode, I talk about something that is much, much worse than death and, in my opinion, it should be what you fear every day. What is it? Listen to this episode to find out!

item.title: How to Get Rid of Anxiety | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 478 - Do you get anxious sometimes? Well anxiety is not a clinical problem, it is something that WE create. We create anxiety from our thoughts. In this episode, I will teach you how to overcome anxiety immediately. Transcript

item.title: The Science of Being #1 | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 477 -¬†John Ruhlin is the #1 sales rep in a $250 million a year marketing companies 65 year history. In this episode we dive in to what it takes to be #1 and what it takes to give gifts that people will always remember. Transcript

item.title: The World Owes You Nothing | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 476 - When did so many people get the feeling that they “deserve” anything? The people who get the furthest in life are the ones that know that they are not owed anything and that they must work their tails off to get what they want in this life. In this episode, I dive into this topic and talk about how to get whatever it is that you want.

item.title: How to Meditate | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 475 - Do you meditate yet? If you do not meditate, this episode will help you get started. If you do meditate, this episode will help you get even deeper into your practice! Transcript

item.title: What Do You Do When You Screw Up? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 474 - We all screw up, but what do you do when you screw up? Your response to your failures, flaws and screw ups are what will make you into the person you will become, so let’s talk about it! Transcript

item.title: How to Hit Your Goals Faster | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 473- Do you want to learn to not only hit your goals but also how to accomplish them faster? In this episode, I dive into a very important secret in goal setting. Check it out! Transcript

item.title: I Am a Failure | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 472 - I have failed way more times than I have succeeded, but it does not affect how I look at myself. In fact, I think that the more I fail, the closer I get to success. If you struggle with the fear of failure or judgement, than this episode is for you! Transcript

item.title: "I Don't Have Time" | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 471 - We have all used this phrase before, but I don’t think we understand how false that it is. In this episode, I will teach you how to find all the time in the world for the things that are the most important to you. Transcript

item.title: Do You Know Where You are Going? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 470 - In order to get to where you want to go, you must know where you are going! Once your brain knows where you are going it will work like a GPS and that is where the magic happens. What does that mean? In today’s episode, I will teach you about your personal GPS. Transcript

item.title: Change Your Beliefs | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 469 - The world seems to be more divided than ever. The reason why is because people hold their beliefs too tightly. In order for your life to change and in order for the world to change we must change what we believe. Today were gonna talk about how to change your beliefs so that you can be successful. Transcript

item.title: How to Multitask | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Want to know the secret to multitasking? My answer is going to surprise you! Make sure to check out this episode… Transcript

item.title: Stop Holding On | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 467 - It is time to finally free yourself from the things that hold you back. You are your own worst enemy! In this episode I talk about how to release yourself from the things that are keeping you from being who you want to be. Transcript

item.title: Do What You Don't Want to Do | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 466 - Why would you ever want to do something that you hate doing? Seems pointless right? Well there is a hidden benefit in doing something you hate doing and I will be talking about that in this episode! Transcript

item.title: When Will You Change? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 465 - I have a tough question for you… When you will finally wake up and make the changes that you want in your life? Most people never make the decision to finally change, will you? Transcript

item.title: Be Humble | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 464 - When was the last time you took a step and realized how great your life actually is? When was the last time you stopped looking at your problems and looked at your blessings? Well in today’s episode we talk about that. Transcript

item.title: The World is on Your Side | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 463 - There are two ways to look at the world - it being for you or it being against you. The one that you choose will dictate how you think, feel and act on a daily basis. Choose wisely. Transcript

item.title: Why Now? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 462 - Why not? Why now? Those are two of the most important questions in your life, but how you use them will dictate the life you create. Transcript

item.title: How to Be "Successful" | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 461 - Everyone wants to be successful, but have you ever defined what success means to you? Success is not something that is the same for each person, it is relative to every one of us. In this episode, I’m going to help you learn how to be successful based on YOUR definition of success. Transcript

item.title: I'm Positively Dissatisfied... | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 460 - How do you deal with the feeling of wanting more without being ungrateful for what you have? How can you be grateful for what you have but still keep driving for bigger and better things? In this episode, I teach you about the careful balancing act of positive dissatisfaction. Transcript

item.title: My 3 Favorite Books | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 459 - Want to know what are the 3 best books that I have read out of hundreds of books? Listen to this episode as I tell you what the 3 books are and my main takeaways from each book. Transcript

item.title: How to Make More Money | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 458 - Want to know the secret to making more money? Well there is one very important thing that you must concentrate on to make it. What is it? Find out in this episode and it will change the way you think of money forever! Transcript

item.title: The Two Most Important Words | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 457 - These two words will dictate the life that you will have. The more serious that you take these words, the more that you will get from your life. What are these words? Listen to today’s episode to find out! Transcript

item.title: Forget Being Motivated | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 456 - The most common question I get asked is “how do I stay motivated?” and the truth is motivation sucks. You don’t want to be motivated, you want to be driven. So in this episode I break down the keys to being driven, no matter how hard life gets! Transcript

item.title: How to Stop Being Negative Forever | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 455 - Is it possible to always be positive? I think it’s possible to get VERY close to that and in this episode I teach the strategy that I have learned helps me be positive even in the worst situations. Transcript

item.title: How to Concentrate Like a Pro | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 454 - We live in world of distractions and every day we receive more. So how to we become masters of focus and concentration? In this episode I give simple, yet powerful, strategies so that you can master the art of concentration. Transcript

item.title: My 10 Day Silent Meditation | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 453 -¬†Want to know what it is like to meditate for 10+ hours a day for 10 days straight? Listen to this episode as I break down my 10 day silent meditation retreat called Vipassana. Transcript

item.title: Hit Your Goals Quicker | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 452 - Most people struggling hitting their goals, but what if there was a secret to actually hit your goals quicker? Listen in to this episode and learn how to hit all of your goals faster. Transcript

item.title: The Habits to Build Your Life | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 450 - 47% of what we do every day is habits. We are on autopilot during those times. We need to take a step back and assess if those habits are the ones that we want controlling our lives. In this episode, I break down how to create the habits that you want and destroy the ones that you do not. Transcript

item.title: You Get What You Focus On | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 449 - Too often we focus on what we don’t want, but then get mad that we get more of it. In this episode I talk about the power of focus and how it is proven to be true through science. Transcript

item.title: My Problem With Personal Growth | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 447 - Personal growth is amazing, it changed my life, but I do have one really big problem with it! I think we need to chat about it and warn you about it as well. So let’s dive into that issue on this episode! Transcript

item.title: Relive Your Memories | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 446 - One of the most important things that we can do as adults is to go back and relive our toughest memories. Why is that? Listen to this episode to find out why and how to do it! Transcript

item.title: Law of Attraction Explained in 3 Minutes | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 445 - You have heard of the law of attraction but you are still confused how it works right? Let me give you a simple, quick and easy explanation to help you understand the basics! Transcript

item.title: How to Make Money Online w/ Kavit Haria | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 444 - Want to learn how to make money online? It’s the dream isn’t? But where do you start? This interview will help open your eyes to the massive world of online marketing and expand your mindset of how you can make an income on the internet. Transcript

item.title: Share Good | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 441- There is much negativity in the world, but what is the good in sharing that? Sharing it makes more of it, therefore shouldn’t we share more of what we want, not what we don’t want? Listen to this episode to find out! Transcript

item.title: Turn Off Your Brain | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 440 - As amazing as our brains are, a lot of the times they just create fear and cause us to overthink and not take action. How do you get past that part of your brain? Listen to this episode and find out! Transcript

item.title: Empowering Thoughts | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 439 - How do you speak to yourself in your own head? Do you use empowering words or do you talk down to yourself? The most important conversation that you will ever have is the on you have between yourself. In this episode, I’m going to dive into the strategies to build yourself and become happier. Transcript

item.title: How to Change Your Habits | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 438 - We are our habits, good and bad. Therefore, if we want to change our lives, we must change our habits. But how do we change them? Listen to this episode to learn how habits work in our brains and how to change them. Transcript

item.title: Perfect is Impossible | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 437 - Every human is a “perfectionism” it seems. Yet perfectionism is the enemy of creation. Perfectionism does not exist though, it is something that we make up in our heads to mask our real fears that are holding us back. Check out this episode to learn how to get past this silent killer of dreams! Transcript

item.title: How to Stop Anxiety & Destructive Thoughts | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 436 - The thing about anxiety is that it can happen to anyone. It can strike at any moment and completely stop you in your tracks for days. In this episode, I talk about the ways anxiety happens, how to overcome it, and how to make sure it never happens again. Transcript

item.title: How to Control Your Brain | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 435 - I would estimate that 90% of people never take control of their brains, they just let it run wild and never fully harness the power of their minds. In this episode I will teach you how to master your mind so that you can create the life that you want. Transcript

item.title: Are Fears Fake? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 434 - Every fear we have holds us back from becoming the greatest version of ourselves, but are fears actually real? Find out in this episode! Transcript

item.title: How Successful People Think | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 433 - There is no background, sex, parental requirement, or ethnicity required for success, success starts in the mind and ends in the physical world. Therefore, in this episode I teach the 3 things that successful people think about differently and how you can change your mind to match theirs. Transcript

item.title: A Secret to Hitting Your Goals | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 432 - We all struggle hitting goals but there is one secret to hitting goals that makes it easier to hit them and also makes you hit them quicker. Check out today’s episode to learn what that is! Transcript

item.title: Imagine Your Funeral | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 431 -¬†We are all going to die but there is one thing that I feel is the most important part of your funeral. What is it? Listen to this episode because thinking about this one thing could change the way you live every day. Transcript

item.title: Why Change Sucks | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 430 - We all want change, we all want to be better but why is it so hard to change? We in this episode I talk about how and why your brain resists change and how to “hijack” your brain to make it do what you want! Transcript

item.title: What The Heck Do You Want? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 428 - If I asked you where exactly do you want to be in 5 years, could you give me an exact answer and tell me exactly how you will get there? Most people can’t. In this episode, I help you get clarity on your life through journaling, which I feel is one of the most important daily routines that we can have. Transcript

item.title: Hidden Opportunities | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 427 - Some of the great opportunities are found in some of the hardest times. So how do we find the opportunities in the obstacles? Let’s chat about it in this episode! Transcript

item.title: Pain & Struggle | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 425 - Pain and struggle is a part of life, there is no way to get a way from it. What if we could use it for good? What if we could use it for growth? Pain and struggle may seem like a bad thing but it may be the most beneficial thing in the world to you. Listen to this episode to learn why… Transcript

item.title: Get Through The Tough Times | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 424 - Life is full of ups and downs. Sometimes when we are up we are worried about falling and when we are down we think we will be there forever. So how do you develop the mental strength so that nothing will knock you over? I’ll teach you that in this episode! Transcript

item.title: My Life Story | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 423 - Want to know pretty much all about me and how I grew up? This is a pretty good way to learn about me! :-) Transcript

item.title: What's the Purpose of Your Life? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 422 - This could be the most important question you ever ask yourself and in this episode I will teach you how to find the purpose of your life and a simple way to put the pieces together to accomplish it. Transcript

item.title: Set Your GPS | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 421 - Your “GPS” will take you to your dreams but how do you set your GPS every day? What are the keys to creating success every morning? Let’s dive into it! Transcript

item.title: Kill Your Comfort | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 420 - Your comfort zone is killing your dreams. Let’s dive into how comfort kills your ambition and how to break out of your comfort zone. Transcript

item.title: Demand Greatness | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 417 - Stop playing small, we all have so much more than we allow ourselves to show to this world. In this episode, I talk the one person who I feel is the closest thing to a superhuman. I believe that once you hear his story that you will be inspired to do more with yourself as well! Transcript

item.title: How to Break Through | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 416 - Are you stuck? Do you need a breakthrough already? Listen to this episode and let’s create that breakthrough right now! Transcript

item.title: Can Mentors Change Your Life? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 415 -¬†It’s not what you know, it’s who you know. Great mentors can be one of the biggest keys to your success. In this episode I break down the importance of a great mentor and how to find that person today. Transcript

item.title: Let Go of the Pain | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 413 -¬†We humans, for some reason, love to hold on to what holds us back. We love to hold on to the misery that should stay in the past. In this episode, I teach how to overcome the pain of what has happened in the past. Transcript

item.title: The Only Way to Success w/ Jay Papasan | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 412 - Want to know the secret to success? In this episode I interview Jay Papasan, author of one of my top 3 favorite books “The ONE Thing.” We go in very deep on questions that I had from the book and I think you will get massive value from this episode! Transcript

item.title: How to Find Your Passion | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 411 - The question that plagues us all “How do I find my passion?” I answer this question through a simple Japanese technique. Transcript

item.title: How to Change Reality | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 410 - Is your current reality not exactly what you want it to be? What if we could change that reality right now? Check out this episode to learn how to do so. Transcript

item.title: Mastering Public Speaking w/ Jon Vroman | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 409 -¬†The #1 fear in the world is public speaking. So in this episode I have the top-rated college public speaking in the world to give tips on how to overcome that fear and master your mindset! Transcript

item.title: How to Get What You Want NOW | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 408 - Do you know what you want? Let me tell you how to attract it into your life right now! Check this episode out to learn more… Transcript

item.title: Are You Interested? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 407 - This could be one the most important questions at you ask yourself when working towards a successful life. What is the question? Listen to this episode… Transcript

item.title: THE Most Important Thing? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 406 -¬†This could be the most important thing in the world to you. If focused on this and got more of it every single day, it could change your life completely… and I’m not talking about money… Transcript

item.title: The Law of Attraction in 3 Minutes | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 405 - Wonder why your life is not where you want it to be? Test this out and see how your life changes. Transcript

item.title: Get Addicted to This! | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 404 - If there is a good addiction, this might be it. I this episode I talk about this “good” addiction and how to make sure you keep the momentum going after the addiction. Transcript

item.title: Stop Playing Victim | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 403 - Lots of people like to play victim but most people don’t realize that they are volunteering for the issues that they carry with them their whole lives. Check out today’s episode to learn the differences between the two and how to break away from this cycle. Transcript

item.title: The Craziest Man Alive! | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 402 - Want to learn how to push yourself further than you have ever thought possible? In this episode I am going to give you the strategies of quite possibly the craziest man alive! Transcript

item.title: 400 EPISODES - What I Have Learned | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 400 - Wow! Four.Hundred.Episodes! In this episode I dive into what I have learned in the past 400 episodes, how much my life have changed since starting the podcast and what you can learn from my journey. Transcript

item.title: The Key to Consistency | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 399 - Most people don’t start the journey on their dreams and those that do usually quit. So that means if you just start and don’t stop that you will beat 99.9% of people. The key is consistency and we will dive into that topic on this episode. Transcript

item.title: Billion Dollar Business w/ Tom Bilyeu | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 398 -¬†Tom Bilyeu is the Co-Founder and President of Quest Nutrition the #2 fastest growing private company in America. In this episode we dive into why following your passion will always pay more than following the money and how mastering your mind will always pay dividends. Transcript

item.title: Is Your Life Out of Control? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 397 - It is time! It is time to take control for your life once and for all. No more excuses, no more blaming other people or blaming your past. Let’s dive in how to take control of your life and how to make real and lasting changes. Transcript

item.title: Success or Death | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 396 - This is how our mindsets should be regarding anything important in our lives, either we get it or we fail miserably. Never, and I mean never, should we not get something that we want because of fear or giving up, but because we gave it our all and it didn’t work out. Transcript

item.title: Great Things Take Time | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 394 - We live in an instant world. Everything is delivered today or 10 minutes or less, etc. But success will never be instant, it takes time. The greatest things in life take time. Listen to this episode to learn how to train yourself to be okay with delaying your gratification. Transcript

item.title: Are You Addicted? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 393 - This sneaky addiction is running rampant across the world and there is a good chance that you are under it’s spell. In this episode I talk about the addiction and throw a challenge out to my listeners to take control of their minds and see what changes it brings to their days. Transcript

item.title: The Self Esteem Killer | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 392 - Want to kill your self esteem and be unhappy forever? Then do this, and do this all of the time. What is “this” that I am talking about? Listen to today’s episode and find out! Transcript

item.title: Your Friend's Brain is Yours! | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 391 - Did you know that when you spend time with someone, you brainwaves link up? That means YOU BECOME who you spend time with. Check out this crazy information and more in this episode! Transcript

item.title: Success is EASY! | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 390 - Success is not as hard as it is portrayed. The problem is that most people are trying to get there the wrong way. Take the tips in this episode to easily get to your goals! Transcript

item.title: Becoming Tarzan | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 389 - In this episode I finally make the big announcement, join in to hear about it! I also teach you how to hit your goals no matter how far you get off track ;-) Transcript

item.title: Will You Regret It? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 388 - When you are old and gray, are you going to look back on your life with regret or with pride? Will it be a bunch of memories made or a bunch of woulda, coulda, shoulda? Let chat about it! Transcript

item.title: Read 3x Faster Today | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 387 - Want to learn how to read faster right now? Listen to this episode for a simple trick on how to get through books 3x as fast! Transcript

item.title: Why Are We Negative? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 386 - Are you a “negative person”? A lot of people are but why is that? Well, there is a really good reason why humans tend to be negative but I will also teach you how to reverse that. Check out this episode! Transcript

item.title: Kick The To The Curb! | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 385 - Everyone in your life fits into one of two categories. One category you keep in your life, the other you kick to the curb. Check out this episode to learn how to find out which to keep and which to kick. Transcript

item.title: MOTIVATIONAL SPEECH #3: The Most Successful Failure | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 383 - Do you feel like you are not where you want to be? Listen to this episode today! Transcript

item.title: MOTIVATIONAL SPEECH #2: Limitations Are Optional | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 382 - This is a short motivational speech that I made for you to listen to every day, if you want to do so. The only limits that exist in your life are the ones that you place on yourself or the ones that others have placed on you that you have accepted. Break through those limitations and create something special in your life! Transcript

item.title: MOTIVATIONAL SPEECH #1: People's Opinions Aren't Real | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 381 - This is one of my favorite episodes that I have ever recorded. In this episode, I talk about the influence of other’s opinions in our lives, how to get past them and how to live like a happy and carefree kid again. Transcript

item.title: Understanding Emotions & Habits | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 379 - Your emotions are not real, they are habits and patterns that you have developed along your lifetime. Don’t believe me? Listen to today’s episode! Transcript

item.title: Change Your Habits & Your Brain | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 378 - In this episode I teach you how to change your brain so that you can get rid of your bad habits and create new ones! Transcript

item.title: 10,000 Hours | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 377 - Have you heard of the 10,000 hour rule? It is one of my favorite concepts. Why? Because to me it means that we can do anything that we want to if we are willing to dedicate our lives to it. Tune in to today’s episode as I speak about this empowering concept! Transcript

item.title: Your Excuses Suck! | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 376 - Excuses are like buttholes, everyone has one and they all stink! Your life will not change until you learn how to finally release yourself from your excuses. In this episode I teach how to free yourself from your excuses and take extreme ownership of your life. Transcript

item.title: Piece Together Your Life | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 375 - As much as we like to plan our lives out, sometimes we get a curveball thrown as us that was not part of the plan. What do you do now? How do we use that curveball as an integral part of the journey? Let’s talk about it in this episode! Transcript

item.title: How to Make a Bad Week Good | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 374 - Some days or weeks can feel like a struggle, so how do you change it? How do you turn it around and make something great out of each day? In this episode, I will give you my best strategies to do so. Transcript

item.title: Quit Your Job | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 373 - Do you hate your job? Do you feel like there is more out there in the world besides building someone else’s dream? Listen to this episode to learn about following your own dreams! Transcript

item.title: 5 Habits of Billionaires | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 372 - Want to be successful? Do what the most successful people do. In this episode, I give the 5 habits that I see of the most successful people in the world. Transcript

item.title: How to Hit Your Goals Quicker | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 371 - In this episode I dive into one of the biggest keys to hitting your goals quicker than you ever have! Transcript

item.title: How to Hit Your Resolutions | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 370 - Want to hit your New Years Resolutions? Here’s the simplest way to do it! Transcript

item.title: Why Are Humans Negative? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 369 - Ever wonder why it is so hard to be positive and why it is easier to be negative? In this episode, I teach you how we are hardwired to look for negative and how to reverse that. Transcript

item.title: Work Your A** Off | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 368 - In working towards your goals, you have two options - work your butt off or regret that you didn’t when you get older. Transcript

item.title: The Sad Truth | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 367 - This holiday season let’s have gratitude. We get caught up in our own worlds and forget how good we really have it. 795 million people are starving in the world right now and 36 million of them will die this year of starvation. In this episode I break down the statistics around hunger in hopes of opening your eyes up to the world that we don’t see, so that we can be more grateful for what we do see.

item.title: Get Clear on Your Goals | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 366 - One of the main issues I see with people and their goals is lack of clarity. The more clearly that you can see your target the better chance you have of hitting in. In this episode, I break down how to get very clear on what it is that you want. Transcript

item.title: How to Change Your Life Today | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 363 - If your life is not where you want it to be, it is time to change it. It is time for you to act like you are in a movie and you are the hero of your own story. Today is the day and in this episode I teach you how to make today the first day of the rest of your life. Transcript

item.title: Break Out of the Rate Race | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 360 - Want to quit your job? In this episode I talk about how quitting your job is possible and start the conversation on how to quit your job. Transcript

item.title: Be The Hero | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 359 - Your life is up to you. No one will change your life but you. In this episode, I will dive into how you should be the hero of your own story and change your life today! Transcript

item.title: You Are Wasting Your Time | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 358 - Are you constantly busy but still feel like you don’t have enough time in the day to get everything done? People are constantly busy but rarely productive. In this episode we talk about how to get more done in less time! Transcript

item.title: Accomplish Your Dreams | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 357 - We all have things that we want in life, but how do we bring them into our lives and accomplish all of our goals? I dive into that topic on today’s episode! Transcript

item.title: The Secrets to Self Talk | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 356 - The most important conversation you will have is with yourself. The way you talk to yourself will dictate your outside world. In this episode, I talk about the importance of self talk as well as how to make sure you are doing it right! Transcript

item.title: How to Change Everything | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 355 - How you do one thing is how you do everything. Every little detail matters. That is why in this episode I talk about why you need to focus on going over and above in everything that you do. Transcript

item.title: Why You Don't Have What You Want | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 354 - 100 million people in America are not happy with their current lives. That is an incredible statistic! How do we get the life that we want then? I dive into this topic on this episode. Transcript

item.title: Outgive Everyone | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 353 - A lot of people think that in order to be successful you need to take, take, take. That is completely false and in this episode I tell you how giving is a quicker way to be successful. Transcript

item.title: You Are Limitless | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 352 - The only limits that exist in your life are the limits that you impose upon yourself. If you are not where you want to be it is because you are holding yourself back. In this episode I dive into this topic and teach how to release yourself from those limits. Transcript

item.title: 6 Steps to Greatness | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 351 - In this episode I dive into the mind of Kobe Bryant and teach you all about the mindset that he has that has made him one of the greatest basketball players ever. This is applicable to every aspect of life, not just basketball. Transcript

item.title: Positive Dissatisfaction | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 350 - Are you the type of person that constantly keeps pushing yourself? Sometimes having that type of personality can be disheartening, because the closer you get to your goals, the more you raise them which makes them seem further away. In this episode we’ll talk about how to push hard towards your goals but also enjoy the journey as well. Transcript

item.title: Get Rid of It? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 348 - Does it serve me? That is an important question to ask yourself as often as possible. Sometimes if something is not serving you, it is time to get rid of it. Let’s dive into that topic on this episode! Transcript

item.title: You Have Control Issues | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 347 -¬†You are in control of your life. You and only you! Not your family, spouse, president or any of them. The sooner you realize this and accept responsibility for all that happens in your life, the sooner you can start making real changes in your life. Transcript

item.title: Grow Into Your Future Self | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 345 - Achieving your goals does not happen by chance. It takes planning and working towards it. You need to know where you want to go and how you are going to get there. One thing that people don’t think about, though, is who they need to be to get there and planning out their growth as a person. Today I will teach you how to plan that and grow into the person that you need to become.

item.title: Destroy Your Stress | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 344 - Every once in a while, does stress pop up and cripple you on your path to success? Check out this episode to learn how to handle your stress and contain it on your journey. Transcript

item.title: Keeping Positive & Beating Cancer w/ Hal Elrod | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 342 - Hal Elrod has died once. Now he can say he beat cancer. Recently cancer free, Hal takes us through what it was like to be diagnosed with cancer and how he only accepted that he had cancer but also remained extremely positive while fighting it. This is my favorite interview I have done to date, I can’t wait for you to listen to it! Transcript

item.title: Maximizing Your Potential | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 341 - On a scale of 1-10, how much are you living up to your potential in life? Do you have more to give? In this episode, I break down why we so much more potential than we think we do and how to maximize yours. Transcript

item.title: The $100k Coach w/ Jon Berghoff | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 340 - Jon Berghoff was my very first mentor. I hired him when I was 19 and paid him $500 a month. He now charges $100k for a weekend. In this episode, we talk about how to change your life through asking the right questions and how to be a great parent. Check it out! Transcript

item.title: The Power of Vulnerability | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 338 - This might be one of the most important episodes I have ever done. Vulnerability is a touchy subject but I feel like, if mastered, vulnerability can change your life for the better! Transcript

item.title: 3 Keys to Hitting Your Goals | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 337 - Need help hitting your goals? Here are 3 keys to hitting any goal. Transcript

item.title: How to Screw Up | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 336 - The biggest mistake you could make is not to screw something up, but it is to screw something up and learn nothing from it. Within every failure is a lesson! Transcript

item.title: The Problem w/ Personal Development | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 335 - Personal development has changed my life but I have one main issue with it. Check out this episode to find out my my issue is with it and how to not let it hold you back! Transcript

item.title: Becoming a Millionaire by 25 w Ryan Moran | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 334 - Everyone wants to become a millionaire, but few are willing to do what it takes to become one. Ryan Moran became a millionaire by the age of 25 and in this episode he shares his mindset on what it takes to get there. Transcript

item.title: The Science of Being #1 & Gifting w/ John Ruhlin | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 333 - John Ruhlin is the #1 sales rep in a $250 million a year marketing companies 65 year history. In this episode we dive in to what it takes to be #1 and what it takes to give gifts that people will always remember. Transcript

item.title: How To Be Happier Right Now | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 331 - Happiness is a choice. There is no other explanation. In this episode, I cover how to be happier right now, in this moment. Transcript

item.title: Why Not? vs Why Now? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 330 - The key to you changing could be as easy as changing one question to another. Transcript

item.title: Luck Does Not Exist | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 329 - Luck is an offensive word. It takes away all of the hard work and credibility of someone. Luck does not exist, listen to this episode to find out the truth around the word “luck” Transcript

item.title: Humble Yourself | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 328 - Your life is not as bad as you think it is. Actually, it’s probably pretty amazing! Sometimes you need to be “humbled” to see how great it really is. Listen to this episode to learn what I mean by that. Transcript

item.title: Bali Gratitude | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 327 - As you probably know, I have been traveling Europe and SE Asia the past 4 months. I have met some of the most amazing people and I wanted to share what I have learned from the Thai and Balinese cultures. Transcript

item.title: You Are Holding Yourself Back | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 325 - The only reason why you are not where you want to be is because YOU are holding yourself back! That is the ONLY reason why. Tune in to this episode to learn how to get past holding yourself back. Transcript

item.title: Are You Thankful? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 324 - Want to change your life? Change the way that you view the world. Find small things to be grateful for and give thanks for what you have, even if it doesn’t seem like much. Transcript

item.title: Burn The Ships! | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 323 - There is no reason to have a Plan B because it distracts from Plan A. Burn the ships and take the island! Transcript

item.title: Demand Greatness From Yourself! | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 322 - There is more inside of you that you need to bring out. It is that way for each of us. So how do we force ourselves to be greater? Check this episode to find out how! Transcript

item.title: Are Your Dead Yet? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 321 - Ben Franklin said “Most people die at 25 but aren’t buried until 75.” So, are you already dead? Transcript

item.title: Does it Add to Your Life? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 320 - How do you know when to get rid of something or someone? Well, I cover that in today’s episode by figuring out how much something serves you by being in your life. Transcript

item.title: Eat The Frog First | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 319 - Get your big win first thing in the morning. Eat the frog and go on with your day, and it will be an amazing day. Don’t know what I am talking about? Well then listen in here! Transcript

item.title: Don't Lose Control | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 318 - There is one guarantee in life - you are in control of everything. Every single thing in your life. The moment you realize that is the moment things will change for you. Transcript

item.title: Think in Black and White | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 317 - Most of the time life is either yes or no, go or stop. If you think in black and white and not give yourself a ton of options, it allows you to make decisions quicker and execute. Check out this episode to learn how to be more decisive. Transcript

item.title: A Kick in The A** | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 316 - Need a kick in the a**? Here it is! Transcript

item.title: How to Stand Out & Be Great | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 314 - Do you want an average or mediocre life? Then why do most people want to fit in when that will only make them average? In this episode, I chat about why you should want to stand out and be different than everyone else in order to be great. Transcript

item.title: Interviewing My First Mentor | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 313 - This is a conversation with my first mentor that I paid $500/month to chat with every month at 19 years old. He easily one of the wisest people that I have ever met! Transcript

item.title: Interview w/ Billionaire Jeff Hoffman | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 312 - Ever wanted to know how a billionaire got to where they are? In this episode I interview Jeff Hoffman, who is the billionaire co-founder of Priceline.com. He is a wealth of knowledge and you will learn a ton from just listening to the way he thinks and the way he works. Transcript

item.title: Do What Sucks w/ Jesse Itzler | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 311 - What happens when a billionaire feels stagnant? They hired a Navy Seal, who is considered the toughest man in the world, to come live with them for a month. That’s what Jesse Itzler did, but he did not expect it to be the hardest month of his life. Listen to this episode to learn how the author of the book “Living with a Seal” made it through the toughest 30 days of his life.

item.title: The Secret to Hypnotizing | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 310 - Can just holding a cup of coffee changes your view of the world? You bet! Unconscious priming is influencing your thoughts all day long. Check out this episode to learn more about how priming works. Transcript

item.title: Adversity is Your Friend | The Mindset Mentor
