item.description: Podcast Description Episode 309 - Scared of a little adversity? It’s good for you, it makes you better. A muscle does not grow unless it is put under intense pressure. The same goes for you, so seek out that adversity and grow in the process. Transcript

item.title: What Do You Want?!?! | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 308 - What is it that you want? Do you know? After you know exactly what it is that you want, do you have a roadmap to get there? Well, you will never hit a target that you cannot see! In this episode, I talk about how to get clear on what you want in your life and make a plan to achieve it. Transcript

item.title: Your Problems Are Fake | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 307 - Your problems do not exist. They are all made up in your head. Listen to this episode to learn how to overcome the “problems” Transcript

item.title: Your Focus Creates Your Reality | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 306 - What you focus on magnifies. If you focus on what could go wrong, a lot of times it will go wrong. But the opposite of that is true as well. Listen to this episode to learn how to change you external world by focusing on your internal dialogue. Transcript

item.title: The One Thing w/ Jay Papasan | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 305 - Jay is the author of The One Thing which is one of my top 3 favorite books that I have read. In this interview he drops some amazing value teaching you how to follow your passion to become successful. Transcript

item.title: People At Your Funeral | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 304 - The true testament to who you were while living is proven by how many people are at your funeral. Transcript

item.title: Multitasking is Dumb | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 303 - Are you a multitasker? You might want to stop after listening to this episode… Transcript

item.title: Master Your Reactions | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 302 - Contrary to what most people believe, your reactions are not impulses. They are completely controllable responses. In this episode I talk about how to master the way you react to all situations. Transcript

item.title: How to Take Whatever Life Throws At You | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 301 - Life can be brutal sometimes. What are you doing in the calm moments to prepare yourself for the battles that life throws at you? You must realize that the better you are, the easier life will be. No matter how hard it gets. Transcript

item.title: Re-Live Your Life | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 300 - What if you could go back an re-live certain parts of your life as the person you are now? How much different would your life be if you could see certain experiences as a mature adult instead of child? What difference would that make in your life? We’re going to chat about that in this episode. Transcript

item.title: Is The World Against You? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 299 - Do you think the world is on your side or do you think that it is working against you? In this episode, I talk about how a small shift in your perception can drastically change your life forever. Transcript

item.title: Money vs Happiness | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 297 - Will money make you happier? No. What will? Engineering happiness into your day. In this episode, I teach how to “engineer your happiness.” Transcript

item.title: My Life Story (in an interview) | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 296 - I stole this audio from my friend Jon Vroman. In this episode, you will hear Jon interviewing me on my life story for his podcast. It is definitely the most in detailed that I have been on my life story in an episode. If you want to be put in a drawing for a FREE month of 1-on-1 coaching with me go to 9spokes.com/RobDial and sign up for free!

item.title: The Voices in Your Head | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 295 - We all doubt ourselves. If you want to life a life completely unfulfilled you should listen to the little voice inside of you head. If you want a great a life, you must follow your heart and not listen to that little voice. In this episode, I talk about how to silence that little voice. Transcript

item.title: Law of Attraction - Explained in Under 3 Minutes | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 294 - Still confused about the law of attraction? Here is my quickest and simplest way of explaining how to use it in your life! After listening to this, ask yourself what am I attracting into my life that I do not want and what do I want to start attracting into my life by changing my thoughts? Transcript

item.title: Why You Should Wait | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 293 - In a world where everything is instant, delaying your gratification could be the secret to success that you need. Check out this episode as I dive more into this topic! Transcript

item.title: Make Tiny Adjustments | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 291 - You are so much closer to success than you realize and you do not need massive adjustments to have a completely different life. Usually, it is a series of small adjustments that change the outcome of your life and your success. Transcript

item.title: It Doesn't Go How You Plan It | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 290 - In this episode, I describe how a real experience that I had in the park is the perfect example of life and the roadblocks that pop up on the way to your goal. Transcript

item.title: Being Lucky vs Being Intentional | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 289 - Luck is a BS word. Luck is found in gambling and the lottery but not in success. Intention is found in success. Listen to this episode to understand how to be more intentional and plan out your road to success. Transcript

item.title: I Love Failing | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 288 - Failing is a beautiful thing. It is not something to be afraid of or to fear, it is something to learn from. In this episode, I teach you how to change your mindset on failing and how to get motivated through your failures. Transcript

item.title: You Are Poisoning Yourself | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 286 -¬†What good does it do to hold on to anger? Holding onto anger is like drinking poison and expecting the other person to die. In this episode, I dive into anger and how it is a learned behavior which can be unlearned. Transcript

item.title: Pain vs Suffering | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 285 -¬†Pain is inevitable but suffering is a choice. Pain is something that happened to you in your past, suffering is keeping that pain with you in the present. In this episode, I teach you how to stop suffering and allowing your suffering from holding you back. Transcript

item.title: Break Out Of Your Comfort Zone | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 284 -¬†Do you know why you are stuck in a comfort zone or why our brain creates comfort zones? In this episode, I teach how and why the brain creates comfort zones and how to break out of them. Transcript

item.title: What If Money Didn't Exist? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 282 - What would you do if money didn’t exist? How would you spend your days? Would you be doing different than you are right now? Let’s dive into that topic and see if a life change is necessary! Transcript

item.title: Pt 3 - How to Attract More Money | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 281 - This is part 3 of my 3 part series on the law of attraction. This episode is geared towards how to have the correct mindset to attract more money into your life. Please listen to part 1 and 2 before listening to this episode! Transcript

item.title: Pt 2 - The Law of Action | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 280 - Do not listen to this episode until you listen to part 1 first. This is the second step to the law of attraction and the one that people never talk about. Transcript

item.title: Pt 1 - The Law of Attraction | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 279 - This is part 1 of a 3 part series on the Law of Attraction. I this episode I talk about how I have used it to change my life and teach you how to use it as well! Transcript

item.title: The People at Your Funeral | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 278 - Are you spending your time focusing on dollars in your bank account or people at your funeral? Let’s chat about what really matters! Transcript

item.title: Are You Being Hypnotized? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 277 - Is the outside world hypnotizing you and changing the way you think without your knowing? Let’s talk about it in this episode! Transcript

item.title: The Pain of Regretting Your Life | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 276 - What is worse the pain of hard work or the pain of regret? We’ll talk about that in this episode! Transcript

item.title: Aquire More Skills | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 275 -¬†“Don’t wish for it to be easier, wish for more skills” In order to become the person that you want to become you must acquire more skills and more knowledge. Whether you are an entrepreneur or and employee the only way to make more money is to make yourself more valuable to them marketplace and the way to do that is to gain more knowledge.

item.title: Don't Fear Death | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 274 - Are you afraid of dying? Let’s talk about it and let me try to change your mind on why that shouldn’t be your biggest fear and what should be. Transcript

item.title: What is Your Life's Purpose? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 273 - Why are you live? I promise you it is not so you can just pay bills and die! In this episode I break down this topic and teach you how to find your purpose! Transcript

item.title: Comfort KILLS Ambition | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 271 - Have you been stuck in a comfort zone for a while now? Do you want to stay there forever, or do you want better for you life? Your comfort zone is killing your ambition so it is time to make yourself uncomfortable! Transcript

item.title: Stop Holding On To What Holds You Back | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 270 - People view their past and their problems as a badge of honor. They lived through it, so they want to carry it with them proudly. The only problem with that is that it holds them back from their true potential. Listen to this episode to learn how to get past the things that are holding you back from your greatness. Transcript

item.title: How to Plan the Rest of Your Life | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 269 - Stop trying to plan out your entire life. This episode will dive into the importance of planning just the next step¬†and how to live your life like you are looking through headlights. Transcript

item.title: Meditation 101 | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 268 - One of the top questions that I am asked is “How to I start meditating?” and in this episode, I explain how simple it is to start this powerful exercise. Transcript

item.title: Become Who You Want to Be | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 267 - So you know who you want to be when you grow up? Let me tell you how to get there by becoming the person that you need to become to attract the life that you want! Transcript

item.title: Stop Chasing Rabbits | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 266 -¬†As an entrepreneur, it is hard to figure out exactly what path to dedicate time and focus to. A lot of people have multiple passions or multiple directions that could make them tons of money, yet because of that they are paralyzed by not knowing which one to dedicate their time to. In this episode I dive in on this topic and help you realize that chasing two rabbits results in catching neither one.

item.title: How to Change Your Habits & Patterns | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 265 - Your habits and patterns can hold you back, but they can also push you forward if they are the correct habits and patterns. In this episode, I talk about how patterns and habits happen chemically in your brain and how to change them. Transcript

item.title: Are You Addicted to Thinking? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 263 - You are not your thoughts… but are you addicted to overthinking? Are you allowing overthinking to hold you back from the life that you want? Listen in to this episode to learn how to break free from your thoughts and live in the moment. Transcript

item.title: The Tarzan Method | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 262 - You are Tarzan and your journey to success is the jungle. Listen to this episode to learn how being Tarzan will help you be successful :-) Transcript

item.title: How to Overcome Anxiety Immediately | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 261 -¬†Do you suffer from anxiety? When you are anxious what happens? Your heart beats faster, your cortisol levels raise, and your body prepares for something. The fight or flight mechanism kicks in. Panic attacks can also be a problem when it comes to anxiety and anxiety can paralyze a person and hold them back from their true potential and the life that they want. This is EXACTLY what happens to your body when you get excited as well.

item.title: Why You Don't Want Motivation | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 260 - Motivation sucks. Motivation is fleeting. What you are searching for is drive and determination. Check out this episode to learn how to become more driven! Transcript

item.title: Does This Hold You Back? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 258 - This is one way that people really tend to hold themselves back and how to get past it. Transcript

item.title: Stop Trying to Change the World | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 257 - The world does not need you to change it, the world needs you to change yourself and then be an example for others on how to be. Listen in to this episode for a more in depth explanation! Transcript

item.title: 20 Years From Now... | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 255 - As you get old, regret will be one of the hardest things to overcome. I am not talking about regretting the things you have done, I am talking about regretting the things you did not do… Transcript

item.title: The Power of Clarity | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Transcript

item.title: 10,000 Keys to $1 Million | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 253 -¬†If I gave you a 10,000 keys and said one key opens a door to $1 million would you try ever key to unlock that door? Yes, we all would! In this episode I talk about success, and how success leaves clues if you are willing to look for them. Transcript

item.title: How to Make $100k | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 252 - In this episode I teach you the #1 key to making $100k this year. Transcript

item.title: Done is Better Than Perfect | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 250 - There will never be a perfect time. Your project will never be perfect. You will never be perfect. Sometimes you just need to remind yourself that finishing is better than trying to make everything perfect in the end. Transcript

item.title: How to Boil a Frog | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 249 - There is an old saying that in order to boil a frog you must do it slowly. By the time it realizes it is boiling it is already too late. That directly relates to a lot of people’s lives in a weird way. Check out this episode to learn how! Transcript

item.title: You're Not a "Victim" | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 248 - If something bad happened in your past and you are still help back from it then your are a “volunteer” not a “victim.” Pain is inevitable but suffering is a choice. For more clarification on this topic listen to today’s episode! Transcript

item.title: BONUS EPISODE: Group Coaching Info | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Since I get so many emails asking about group coaching, I decided to make this bonus episode explaining exactly what it is. Transcript

item.title: GO ALL IN! | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 247 - What if you decided to stop listening to your fears and limiting beliefs and for the rest of the year you went all out and put 100% into your life and everything you do? What would your life look like? How much improvement would be made? Listen to this episode to dive more into this topic! Transcript

item.title: 1 Year vs 1 Decade | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 246 - “People overestimate what they can do in a year but underestimate what they can do in a decade.” In this episode I talk about the importance of being patient and building a strong foundation for your life and your success. Transcript

item.title: Society's Brainwash | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 244 - In society we are raised to fit in - to sit down, shut up, speak when spoken to, raise your hand to speak, etc. That type of mindset does not make a successful rebel. Listen to this episode to learn how to not fit in to be successful. Transcript

item.title: Follow Through | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 243 -¬†It is easy to start something but finishing is where success if found. Everyone can say they will do something but few can follow through and get it done! Transcript

item.title: Procrastination is B.S. | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 242 -¬†People always want to know how to stop procrastinating. The truth is procrastination is a fancy word for not caring. If you care about something enough, you will not procrastinate. You will get it done, it is that simple. Transcript

item.title: The Ice Man, Frozen in Ice | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 241 - I am obsessed with human potential and people that push the boundaries. Wim Hof is one of those people. He currently holds 26 world records and is changing the way that scientists believe that humans influence their bodies with their minds. Listen to this episode for more on this topic! Transcript

item.title: 10 Habit of Millionaires | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 239 - If you want to be successful, study what successful people do and then do it! Listen in on this episode to learn the 10 habits I find are the most common habits when studying millionaires. Transcript

item.title: Don't Be a Donkey | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 238 -¬†Have trouble making decisions? You can do almost anything that you want in this life, you just can’t do it all at once. It’s about figuring out what is next and then executing. Don’t try to do multiple things at once. Don’t have a Plan B. Just make a decision and execute. Transcript

item.title: How to Find a Mentor | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 236 - One thing that successful people always have is mentors. It is a secret to succeeding quicker and at a higher level. Listen to this episode for information on how to find the right mentor. Transcript

item.title: Productivity vs Busy Work | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 235 - This could be your difference between being successful and being unsuccessful. Transcript

item.title: Your Life is Not Hard | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 233 - This episode might be the kick in the face you might need right now! Transcript

item.title: Live Limitless | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 230 - The only reason why someone is not where they want to be is because of the limits they place on themselves. Listen to this episode to learn how to break free from your limiting beliefs. Transcript

item.title: YOUTUBE BONUS: You Are Afraid | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description This is audio pulled from one of my YouTube videos. Subscribe at MWFmotivation.com/YouTube Transcript

item.title: Winning is a Mindset | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 229 - This episode is inspired by watching a winner come back from what seemed like insurmountable odds. Listen in on tips on how to become a winner! Transcript

item.title: Sensory Deprivation Tanks! | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 228 - Curious what a sensory deprivation tank is and what it is like to meditate in one? Listen here for more info on this crazy experience! Transcript

item.title: The 6 Steps to Hitting Any Goal | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 227 - Here I share the 6 step process to setting and achieving any goal that you set for yourself. Whether it’s a New Year’s Resolution or a big life goal, this goal setting process from Napoleon Hill’s Book “Think and Grow Rich” will help you accomplish them. Transcript

item.title: BONUS: Take Control! | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description This is a quick 2 minute bonus episode on taking control of your life :-) Transcript

item.title: How to Break Out of The Rat Race | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 226 - Listen in on this episode as I explain the rat race and how you can free yourself from it! Transcript

item.title: How to Get Past Your Past | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 225 - Are you holding yourself back because of something that happened in your past? Are you not where you want to be because of it? Listen to this episode for details on how to get past your past. Transcript

item.title: Success Sucks! | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 224 - Success sucks, but it is also very very simple. Listen to this episode to learn just how simple it is to be successful Transcript

item.title: Read 3x Faster... Right Now | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 223 - Listen here for my secret on how to read 3x faster in 3 minutes! Transcript

item.title: Become a Lighthouse | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 221 - The easiest way to get something to do what you want them to is to be a lighthouse. Confused what that means? Listen to this episode! Transcript

item.title: Your Network Equals Your Networth | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 220 - You are the average of the 5 people that you spend the most time with. That means that you literally become¬†who you are always around. In this episode I talk about the categories of people in your life and who you should spend more time with and who you should spend less time with. Transcript

item.title: The Penny Worth $10.7 Million | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 219 - Would you rather have $3 million in cash or a penny that doubled in value every day for 31 days? The better choice may surprise you… Transcript

item.title: How to Accomplish Your 2017 Goals | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 218 - Hitting your goals is not as hard as you may think. In this episode I will give you the 3 keys to accomplishing your New Year’s Resolutions! Transcript

item.title: Money is Byproduct | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 217 - Most people believe that they need to focus on money in order to make the most that they can. The problem with that is that money should never be the focus. Money is the byproduct of going after your passions or what you truly love to do. Listen to this episode for more info on that! Transcript

item.title: From 0 to $1 Billion w/ Tom Bilyeu | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 216 -¬†Tom Bilyeu is the Co-Founder and President of Quest Nutrition the #2 fastest growing private company in America. In this episode we dive into why following your passion will always pay more than following the money and how mastering your mind will always pay dividends. Transcript

item.title: How to Plan Your Life | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 215 - You don’t have to have all the answers… isn’t that nice to hear? You can stop stressing yourself out! You don’t need the answers right now, what you need is the questions and then the answers will eventually come. Confused? Listen to this podcast as I explain! Transcript

item.title: How to Handle Stress | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 214 -¬†Stress is inevitable. It is going to happen to us throughout our lives no matter what we think of it. In this episode I talk about how to learn from stressful situations because most of the time stressful times are our biggest periods of grow and the times when we learn the most about ourselves. Transcript

item.title: Be Full of Yourself | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 213 -¬†Are you full of yourself? Is it a bad thing if you are full of yourself? In this episode I dive into that topic and make a case why being full of yourself is actually be a good thing NOT a bad thing! Transcript

item.title: The 100 Day Challenge | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 212 -¬†This is an interview with Gary Ryan Blair. He is widely known as one of the masters of goal setting and in this episode we talk about his program “The 100 Day Challenge” and talk about the importance of setting and achieving your New Year’s Resolutions.¬†All info can be found at MWFMotivation.com/100days Transcript

item.title: 5 DAYS! | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 211 - Planes need a runway in order to take off. If you want to hit the ground running in the new year you should look at these next few days as your runway. The more momentum you build now, the greater chance you have of making 2017 the best year of your life! Transcript

item.title: Expectations Dictate Results | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 210 -¬†In this episode I talk about how teachers expectations of their students will dictate their students results. If that is the case then how else can expectations dictate results in our lives? The fact is we grow into the expectations that are set for us from an early age and we can either succumb to them or break through them. Listen as I dive into this topic much more in depth.

item.title: The Habits of Successful People | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 208 - With 2017 just around the corner, it is time to start changing your habits to make real and lasting changes. In this episode I cover 5 of the most important habits that successful people have and how you can create them in your life. Transcript

item.title: Be Consistent or Fail | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 206 - One of the main things that separates the 1% of the most successful people in the world from everyone else, the 99%, is consistency. I talk about that in this episode and how to set yourself up to be consistent. Transcript

item.title: Regret or Hard Work | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 204 - You either put in work and make the life of your dreams or you die with regret in the one life you get on Earth. The choice is yours! Transcript

item.title: Stop Thinking & Do Work | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 203 - It’s time to stop getting in your own way, stop thinking, turn off your brain and get to work. In this episode I tell you how to do that! Transcript

item.title: Eat That Frog | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 201 - Eat a live frog every morning. That means do the worst first. Do the thing that is the hardest on your to do list first thing in the morning. Listen to this episode to find out why that is important! Transcript

item.title: EPISODE 200!!!!! | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 200 - In this episode I teach the 8 lessons that I have learned since starting this podcast. It is a little longer¬†than normal¬†but there is a lot to learn from this episode! Transcript

item.title: Do what you HATE doing | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 199 - People want to do what they feel like doing. The problem with that is that they procrastinate on the things that they should do. In this episode I am going to talk to you about how and why to do what you hate doing! Transcript

item.title: Does It Serve You? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 198 - This is a question I recommend you ask yourself when you are going through your patterns, habits, relationships, etc and trying to figure out if they are helping you become the best version of yourself and grow as a person. If they are not it is best to get rid of them ASAP. Transcript

item.title: Personal Growth & The Holidays | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 197 - In this episode I talk about how to focus on growth during the holidays as well as how to live an attitude of gratitude. Transcript

item.title: How to Make $100k in 2017 | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 196 -¬†In this episode I go over what I feel is the #1 tip top making any amount of money that you want. Transcript

item.title: YOU Are In Control! | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 194 - This is the first episode that I have recorded since the Presidential election. These are my thoughts on who is in control and how to take control. Transcript

item.title: Is This Mind Control? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 193 -¬†This might be one of the coolest episodes I have done, in my opinion. I talk about how a small thing like a cup of coffee can have a “hypnotic” effect on people and taint the way they view the world. Transcript

item.title: Ready, Fire, Aim | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 192 -¬†The concept of ready, fire, aim is to start before you are ready. Because if you wait for the perfect time, you will wait forever. Lots of people say they are “planners” and that is why it is hard for them to start, when in reality it is their fear of failure. Don’t hide your fear of failure by saying you are “planner” Transcript

item.title: Grow Into Yourself | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 190 - In 10 years we all want to be further along in our lives than we currently are but how do you plan that out? In this episode I give you the details on how to plan out where you want to be in the future and how to become the person that you need to be at that point. Transcript

item.title: Pushing Past Your Limits w/ Jesse Itzler | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 188 - Jesse Itzler is a serial entrepreneur and owner of the Atlanta Hawks. But even though he is as successful as he is he felt that he was stuck in a rut a few years back. So what did he do? He hired the “toughest man in the world” to come live with him for 30 days to completely shake his life up. This interview is about Jesse having a Navy SEAL live with him for 30 days!

item.title: How to Live Stress Free | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 186 -¬†Our lives are dictated by the emotional state that we live in. That being said, if we want to change our lives, we need to change our emotional state. In this episode I give the top 5 tips to rid yourself of stress. Transcript

item.title: The Science of Gifting and Getting Mentors w/ John Ruhlin | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 185 - John Ruhlin is the #1 Cutco Sales Representative in the 70 year history of the company. He has used gifting as a way to make massive sales as well as get massively influential mentors. In this episode we talk about the science of gift giving as well as how to get great mentors in the process. Transcript

item.title: Living with Gratitude | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 183 - The happiest and most powerful way to live is with gratitude. By living this way we actually attract more of what we want and less of what we don’t. It is a key topic that is not talked about enough and in this episode I dive into why and how to live with gratitude. Transcript

item.title: Stop Studying & Start Training | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description WARNING: This episode might be a big a wake up call!!¬†There is a BIG difference between studying, training and executing. In this episode I break down each and tell you may be wasting your life doing something that will bring you absolutely now success. Transcript

item.title: Take Control of Your Life w/ Tucker Max | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 179 - Tucker Max is a 3x NY Times best selling author. In this episode we dive deep into psychology and how he was able to change his life and his happiness by diving into his deep psychological issues first. Transcript

item.title: Make Small Adjustments | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 177 -¬†I get a lot of emails asking when the right time to give up would be, whether in a business, relationship, or otherwise. Some times giving up is the right answer but some times the only adjustments that need to be made are to our approach or to the way we go about business. In this episode I talk about how most times people don’t realize how close to success they actually are, as long as the make some small adjustments.

item.title: Think in Black & White | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 175 - Do you¬†tend to overcomplicate situations by thinking too much? Either you do something or you don’t. If you think and worry about everything, you are still NOT doing it! There is no need to overcomplicate. Think in black and white, either you do it or you don’t. And if you don’t, then move on to the next thing and keep going! Transcript

item.title: How to Overcome Jealousy | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 174 -¬†What is jealousy? At it’s core it is desire for something for something that we do not have that someone else does. The problem with jealousy is that when we become jealous we push whatever it is that we want away from us. In this episode I speak about how to overcome jealousy and to make it work for you. Transcript

item.title: Fitting in = Mediocrity | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 173 - In this episode I talk about the fear of rejection and standing out. I also explain why you should WANT to stand out and never fit in with society! Transcript

item.title: How to Make Money | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 172 - In this episode I talk about the #1 thing to focus on to make a lot of money in your life. Transcript

item.title: What Do You Deserve? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 171 -¬†Everything is immediate nowadays. You can get the answer to almost any question, anywhere, and at the touch of your smartphone.¬†Because of that, people¬†today want immediate gratification. Success is never immediate, success takes time. In fact, it can take years. In this episode I talk about how to get to where you want by playing the long game and concentrating on improving with every failure.

item.title: I Am... | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 169 - “I Am…” The sentences or words that follow those two words are the most important words you will ever say. That sentence can either be empowering or disempowering, the choice is yours. In this episode I dive into this topic and tell you how these words can change your life. Transcript

item.title: Focus or Crash | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 166 - Why is it that when something negative happens that it seems to set off a chin reaction of other negative things? It might not be tat more negative things are happening, it might actually be due to the fact that when you focus on the negative it will make it harder to see the positive around you. This is called inattention blindness and I dive into that topic in this episode.

item.title: How to Build Confidence When You Fail | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 165 -¬†We are all going to fail, that is part of life. The important thing to learn is how to best respond to failure. Last week the question “How do you keep confidence while working towards your goal especially when you fail?” I thought that would be a great podcast topic so I answer that question in this episode. Transcript

item.title: How to Change Your Beliefs | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 164 -¬†What you believe about yourself will directly affect what you will become. Here is the truth - most of us are held back by our beliefs about ourselves and only that. In this episode I talk about the importance of your beliefs and the easiest way to change them to make the life you want. Transcript

item.title: Getting Out of a Rut! | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 163 -¬†As humans, we all get in ruts. We all have days where we are completely unmotivated and don’t want to put in any work. In this episode I give my top 3 tips to getting yourself out of a rut. Transcript

item.title: Decide: Succeed or Die Trying | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 162 - Do you really want to succeed? Then you must get rid of your back up plan! If you know what you want to do and you know it’s your passion then there is no reason to have a Plan B because all it does is distract you from Plan A. In this episode I dive deeply into this topic and how to make your Plan A your only plan.

item.title: How to Attract More Money | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 161 -¬†How is your relationship with money? Good, bad, do you worry about not having enough? Our relationship with money and how we view money will be the #1 gauge on how much money we will make in our lives. In this episode I explain how that works and also give steps on how to shift your mindset on money in order to attract more into your life.

item.title: The Law of Action | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 160 -¬†If you have not listened to Episode 159, you will want to listen to that episode first. That being said, this episode covers the next step in The Law of Attraction, the part that I believe The Secret leaves out, the part where you actually get off you butt and put in work. The universe rewards those who work and in this episode I explain the subject more in depth.

item.title: The Law of Attraction | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 159 -¬†I am very excited to release this episode because this is something I firmly believe in.¬†The Law of Attraction says that you are in control of what you attract into and detract from your life. That being said, we need to learn and use The Law of Attraction to get what we want in our lives and in this episode I describe how to do that.

item.title: How to Start Living Fearlessly | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 158 - In the last episode we talked about the story you are telling yourself. That story is built on the fears that hold you back. In this episode I talk about how to find your fears and conquer them through strategy, developing a new story and changing the state your body is in. Transcript

item.title: Building a Billion Dollar Business | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Tom Bilyeu is the Co-Founder and President of Quest Nutrition the #2 fastest growing private company in America. In this episode we dive into why following your passion will always pays more than following the money and how mastering your mind will always pay dividends. He took¬†Quest Nutrition from zero to over a billion dollars in sales in three years Transcript

item.title: Use Empowering Words | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 155 - How do you talk to yourself? Most of us beat ourselves up for small mistakes. Would you speak to someone you love the way you speak to yourself? In this episode I talk about how using empowering words when speaking to yourself can actually rewire your brain. These are the most important conversations you will ever have so choose your words wisely. Transcript

item.title: Find Opportunities in Obstacles | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 154 - “What benefit can come from this?” That could be the most empowering question you ever ask yourself. We all know tough times will come, but the difference between a mediocre life and a life mastered is what we do with the tough times. In this episode I dive into how to find the opportunity in any obstacle in your way. Transcript

item.title: Hack Your Brain | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 152 - Your brain is a 2 million year old piece of machinery. It is not designed to keep you happy or make sure you are successful, it is designed to keep you safe. That being said, there are things you need to learn about your brain in order to “hack” it so that you can get past your fears and create the future you desire. Transcript

item.title: Create Opportunities, Don't Wait for Them | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 150 - If you want new opportunities you have to create them by getting out, networking and working for them. Most people wait around and hope they will get a new idea or an opportunity will come there way but that is not how it works. In this episode I dive into this topic and talk about the best ways to make new opportunities. Transcript

item.title: Follow The Headlights | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 149 - Most people worry about the future, though they have no idea if they’ll even be alive tomorrow. It makes no sense to focus on something that isn’t even here yet and may never get here. In this episode I talk about how life is like headlights, you can only see 15 feet in front of you so just focus on making those the most perfect 15 feet that you can.

item.title: Be Happy For No Reason | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 148 - Why do people in society think it is normal to be sad or have a crappy attitude but when we walk around always happy and excited people think we are on drugs? In this episode I talk about this topic and dive into how to control your own happiness and not worry about what other think. Transcript

item.title: Compassion Over Hatred | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 147 - It is easy to hate, but you know what is hard? To learn to have compassion when you want to hate. In this episode I dive deep into this topic and talk about how learning to have compassion will make you a happier, more patient person. Transcript

item.title: How to Have Patience | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 146 - “Patience is bitter, but the fruit is sweet.” It is hard to have patience when you look around and see all that you don’t have and all that you are not. In this episode I talk about the keys to being patient and why having patience is one of the biggest key to being successful. Transcript

item.title: Your Second Brain | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 144 - Did you know you have a part of your body that scientists call your “second brain”? Well you do, it’s your gut. It holds over 100 million neurons and that is why you get a “gut feeling.” In this episode I talk about trusting your gut over your brain and tell you how to use it making tough decisions. Transcript

item.title: Master Your Mind | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 142 - In this episode I talk about taking control of your mind. That is the first step to mindset mastery and until someone makes the decision to take control, nothing in their world will change. This is step one of five my webinar “Mindset Mastery” which can be found at MWFmotivation.com/webinar Transcript

item.title: How to Make 100k This Year | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 141 - In this episode I go over what I feel is the #1 tip top making any amount of money that you want. Transcript

item.title: Put Yourself in a State of Awe | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 140 - Everything is amazing and people fail to notice it. We live in the most amazing time in human history but people are still unhappy. The secret is that the quality of your life will be dictated by what you choose to focus on. In this episode I talk in depth on that topic and how you can change your focus. Transcript

item.title: You Have No Problems | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 139 - Problems do not exist in reality, the only exist in our minds. There are no real problems, there are only challenges and we decided whether or not we want to conquer them. In this episode I dive deep into problems and how we view them in our minds so that we can overcome them in reality. Transcript

item.title: Destroy Your Fears | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 138 - The only thing between us and our dream life is the fears we allow to live inside of our minds. We must learn how to destroy our fears so that they cannot hold us back any more. In this episode I go in depth on how to use incantations to do that. Transcript

item.title: Adversity Defines You | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Ep 133 - One thing is for sure, you will have more adversity before you die. So how do you deal with it? In this episode I talk about how to use adversity to your advantage and to treat your life like a movie and you are the star actor. Transcript

item.title: Break Free of the Rat Race | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Ep 131 - Want to break free form the rat race and live a life that you are passion at about, something that you can be proud of? Listen to this episode for my thoughts on the rat race and how to break free from it. Transcript

item.title: Complaining is Not a Strategy | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Episode 127 - Every time you complain to take a step away from your goals. Complaining has no value. Complaining is a cancer that eats you from the inside and it is completely self inflicted. In this episode I talk about the CEO Amazon and his thoughts on complaining. Transcript

item.title: What You Don't Do Haunts You | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description ‚ÄúTwenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream." Transcript

item.title: Dealing With Bad Days | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Ep 124 - If you think about it nothing is really good or bad, it is only the label that we give it. That being said people allow little things that happen completely ruin their day. You must learn that nothing can make you made without you giving it the permission to do so. In this episode I talk about how to turn all your “bad” days into good days.

item.title: Hearing Someone's Last Breath | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Ep 124 - In this episode I talk about something that deeply affected me, being present while my grandfather took his last breath. I wanted to be honest and vulnerable and tell you what I learned from being there. Transcript

item.title: Hard Work Win EVERY TIME | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Ep 121 -¬†Hard work wins every time! Hard work is the undisputed heavyweight champion of the world. In this episode I talk about how to develop a great worth ethic and beat out all of the lazy people in the world. Transcript

item.title: The Worst 4 Letter Word | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Ep. 118 - The most offensive four letter word in the english language is the world luck.¬†Luck does not exist. People who are successful now and seem “lucky” probably wouldn’t seem lucky to most people years ago when they were struggling to their pay bills. The whole idea of luck takes all of the credit away from the individual. In this episode I dive into that idea.

item.title: Ep 117 - S**t or Get Off the Pot | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description WARNING: This episode might be a big a wake up call!!¬†There is a BIG difference between studying, training and executing. In this episode I break down each and tell you may be wasting your life doing something that will bring you absolutely now success. Transcript

item.title: Ep 116 - Invest in Yourself (KNOWLEDGE IS POWER PT. 4) | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Part Four of the Knowledge is Power Series is “Invest in Yourself” The trouble with most people’s mindsets today is that they have have no trouble spending a couple hundred dollars on drinks each weekend but when it comes to investing into their own knowledge they get cheap. Investing in your own self development is the most surefire way to get a massive return on your investment and in this episode I talk about why.

item.title: Ep 115 - Acquire More Skills (KNOWLEDGE IS POWER PT. 3) | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description “Don’t wish for it to be easier, wish for more skills” In order to become the person that you want to become you must acquire more skills and more knowledge. Whether you are an entrepreneur or and employee the only way to make more money is to make yourself more valuable to them marketplace and the way to do that is to gain more knowledge. Transcript

item.title: Ep 114: Learn From Your Mistakes (KNOWLEDGE IS POWER PT. 2) | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description YOU WILL FAIL. Success is 99% failure. The problem is that most people quit when they fail. In this episode I talk about failure and how to set yourself up to learn from every mistake and failure that you have. Transcript

item.title: Ep 113 - Ignorance is Not Bliss (KNOWLEDGE IS POWER PT 1) | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description This is the first part of a four part series titled “Knowledge is Power.” People love to use the phrase “Ignorance is Bliss” but in 2016¬†ignorance is not bliss, it is tragic. With Google and smartphones, ignorance is a decision and that decision to stay ignorant can leave you poor. Transcript

item.title: Ep 112 - How to Overcome Jealousy | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description What is jealousy? At it’s core it is desire for something for something that we do not have that someone else does. The problem with jealousy is that when we become jealous we push whatever it is that we want away from us. In this episode I speak about how to overcome jealousy and to make it work for you. Transcript

item.title: Ep 111 - How to Build Confidence When You Fail | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description We are all going to fail, that is part of life. The important thing to learn is how to best respond to failure. Last week the question “How do you keep confidence while working towards your goal especially when you fail?” I thought that would be a great podcast topic so I answer that question in this episode. Transcript

item.title: Ep 110 - Master Your Mindset w/ Tom Bilyeu | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Tom Bilyeu is the Co-Founder and President of Quest Nutritionthe #2 fastest growing private company in America. In this episodewe dive into why following your passion will always pay more thanfollowing the money and how mastering your mind will always paydividends. Transcript

item.title: Ep 109 - Chasing Two Rabbits | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description As an entrepreneur, it is hard to figure out exactly what pathto dedicate time and focus to. A lot of people have multiplepassions or multiple directions that could make them tons of money,yet because of that they are paralyzed by not knowing which one todedicate their time to. In this episode I dive in on this topic andhelp you realize that chasing two rabbits results in catchingneither one.

item.title: Ep 108 - Multitasking Makes You Dumb | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Lots of people take pride in being great multitaskers. Theproblem with that is that multitasking is not only slowing you downand making you less efficient, but it is also making you dumber. Inthis episode I share all of the reasons why multitasking needs tobe cut from your daily practice in order to become moreproductive. Transcript

item.title: Ep 107 - Focus or Crash | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Why is it that when something negative happens that it seems to set off a chin reaction of other negative things? It might not be tat more negative things are happening, it might actually be due to the fact that when you focus on the negative it will make it harder to see the positive around you. This is called inattention blindness and I dive into that topic in this episode.

item.title: Ep 106 - Is Being Full of Yourself a Good Thing? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Are you full of yourself? Is it a bad thing if you are full of yourself? In this episode I dive into that topic and make a case why being full of yourself might actually be a good thing NOT a bad thing! Transcript

item.title: Ep 105 - How to Get Out of A Rut | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description As humans, we all get in ruts. We all have days where we are completely unmotivated and don’t want to put in any work. In this episode I give my top 3 tips to getting yourself out of a rut. Transcript

item.title: Ep 104 - Succeed or Die Trying | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description If you really want to be successful you should never have a Plan B - it only distracts you from Plan A. In this episode I talk about two animals that have been inspired by lately - a dog and a sparrow- and the life lessons that we can learn from them. Transcript

item.title: Ep 103 - How to Slow Time Down | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description We always talk about how life is too short but the question I want you to think about is - Is life actually short or are we speeding it up? We are constantly trying to keep ourselves busy and entertained and I have found that doing so actually makes time feel like it is moving faster. When we slow down time slows down. In this episode I talk about how I figured this out and how you can use this in your life as well.

item.title: Ep 102 - Absolute Gratitude | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Gratitude is one of the most important things that you can learn to practice daily. It make you put your life into perspective and when you are grateful, you are happy.¬†In this episode I speak about the lessons I learned from my trip to Nicaragua and how much gratitude I gained from the trip for my 30th birthday. Transcript

item.title: Ep 101 - Make Small Adjustments | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description I get a lot of emails asking when the right time to give up would be, whether in a business, relationship, or otherwise. Some times giving up is the right answer but some times the only adjustments that need to be made are to our approach or to the way we go about business. In this episode I talk about how most times people don’t realize how close to success they actually are, as long as the make some small adjustments.

item.title: Ep 100 - 300 Not 299 | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description In this episode I talk about a concept call 300 not 299 and how it separates the Heavyweight Champion of the World and every other box in the world Transcript

item.title: Ep 99 - People at Your Funeral | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description In this episode I talk about people at your funeral and dollars in your bank account. Which is really the most important to you? The answer is up to you and how you live your life. Transcript

item.title: Ep 98 - Unconscious Priming | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description This might be one of the coolest episodes I have done, in my opinion. I talk about how a small thing like a cup of coffee can have a “hypnotic” effect on people and taint the way they view the world. Transcript

item.title: Ep 97 - What I learned in 30 Years | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description I recorded this episode on my 30th birthday and I talk about what I have found to be the single most important thing to impact the quality of my life in the last 30 years. Transcript

item.title: Ep 96 - Expectations Dictate Results | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description In this episode I talk about how teachers expectations of their students will dictate their students results. If that is the case then how else can expectations dictate results in our lives? I dive into that topic much more in depth. Transcript

item.title: Ep 95 - Change Your Beliefs, Change Your Life | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description What you believe about yourself will directly affect what you will become. Here is the truth - most of us are held back by our beliefs about ourselves and only that. In this episode I talk about the importance of your beliefs and the easiest way to change them to make the life you want. Transcript

item.title: Ep 94 - How to Live Fearlessly | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description In the last episode we talked about the story you are telling yourself. That story is built on the fears that hold you back. In this episode I talk about how to find your fears and conquer them through strategy, developing a new story and changing the state your body is in. Transcript

item.title: Ep 93 - What is Your Limiting Story? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description We are all telling ourselves a story in our heads and everything that we do will be to stay in alignment with that story. The problem with that story is that it is usually limiting us. That we are not good enough, smart enough, good looking enough, etc. Unless we identify that story and crush it, we will never change and our lives will never change. In this episode I talk about the stories we tell ourselves and how to identify what it is.

item.title: Ep 92 - How to Get Rid of Stress | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Our lives are dictated by the emotional state that we live in. That being said, if we want to change our lives, we need to change our emotional state. In this episode I give the top 5 tips to rid yourself of stress. Transcript

item.title: Ep 91 - How to Handle Stress | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Stress is inevitable. It is going to happen to us throughout our lives no matter what we think of it. In this episode I talk about how to learn from stressful situations because most of the time stressful times are our biggest periods of grow and the times when we learn the most about ourselves. Transcript

item.title: Ep 90 - How to Create a Breakthrough | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Have you ever felt stuck? At times, we all do and sometimes all it takes a is breakthrough to completely change the course of your lives forever. In this episode I talk about how to step outside of your comfort zone in order to create massive breakthroughs in our lives. Transcript

item.title: Ep 89 - Are You Playing At Level 10? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description To have an outstanding life it requires us to live our lives at level 10. The problem with that is that level 10 requires lots energy and hard work. In this episode I talk about the difference between a level 5 or 6 life and a level 10 life and challenge you to make a jump to living at level 10 today. Transcript

item.title: Ep 88 - Act As If | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description In order to become the person we want to be in 10 years we must become them right now, today. We must act like they would and do what they would do. We can’t wait to get what we want and then become that person, we must become that person today so that we can then get what we want. Transcript

item.title: Ep 87 - How To Save More Money | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description We all want more money and we want is to see more money in our bank account. That requires us to learn how to better save our money. In this episode I talk about our financial thermometer and how it will regulate how much you will spend and save, and dictate how much you will have in your bank account. This is a must listen for anyone who needs help saving money!

item.title: Ep 86 - How to Attract More Money | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description How is your relationship with money? Good, bad, do you worry about not having enough? Our relationship with money and how we view money will be the #1 gauge on how much money we will make in our lives. In this episode I explain how that works and also give steps on how to shift your mindset on money in order to attract more into your life. Transcript

item.title: Ep 85 - The Law of Action | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description If you have not listened to Episode 84, you will want to listen to that episode first. That being said, this episode covers the next step in The Law of Attraction, the part that I believe The Secret leaves out, the part where you actually get off you butt and put in work. The universe rewards those who work and in this episode I explain the subject more in depth.

item.title: Ep 84 - The Law of Attraction | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description I am very excited to release this episode because this is something I firmly believe in.¬†The Law of Attraction says that you are in control of what you attract into and detract from your life. That being said, we need to learn and use The Law of Attraction to get what we want in our lives and in this episode I describe how to do that. Transcript

item.title: Ep 83 - Interview w/ Billionaire Jeff Hoffman | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Jeff Hoffman is the billionaire Co-Founder of Priceline.com. Jeff is an incredibly successful man with a wealth of knowledge that he shares in this episode. We talk about subjects like how to start your first business and what to concentrate on, how to hire your first employees and even cover what his morning routine is every day. This is an awesome episode and I think you will learn a lot from it!

item.title: Ep 82 - How Hard Are You Really Working? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Are we really working hard towards our goals every day or are we just showing up? If we want to put our 10,000 hours into something, or at least improve at it, we must show up, work hard and push ourselves out of our comfort zones. In this episode I speak about this and offer a challenge to you at the end. Transcript

item.title: Ep 81 - The 10,000 Hour Rule | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description In today’s episode I talk about The 10,000 Hour Rule, something I am truly passion about. I believe that with hard work any person can achieve anything that they set their mind to, and the 10,000 hour rule confirms that belief. Transcript

item.title: Ep 80 - Own What You Want Now! | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description In order to get our dream house, dream car, dream job etc. we need to stop thinking of them as our dreams and something we will have a long time from now. We need to learn to own it now energetically in order to own it physically in the future. Transcript

item.title: Ep 79 - Have You Started Yet? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description What is your dream? If you know what your dream is, have you taken the first step to get there? See, most people know what they want but they never take the first step. They scare themselves out of, or talk themselves out of, making that first step towards their goals. In this episode I talk about how and why to take that first step. Transcript

item.title: Ep 78 - Arrange Whatever Pieces Come Your Way | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Life happens! Throughout our lives good stuff will happen to us, bad stuff, tough stuff, stressful stuff - we already know this. So why do we let it derail our plans and visions when these things happen? In this episode I talk about how to prepare and deal with these things happening so that we can live our our purpose and accomplish our goals. Transcript

item.title: Ep 77 - Burn the Ships | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description There is no reason to have a Plan B because all it does it distract your from Plan A. In this episode I talk about making your decision to follow your passion and to “Burn the Ships” Success is 99% failure and if you accept that then you will not stop until you arrive at your goal. Transcript

item.title: Ep 76 - Excuses are B.S. | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description I hate excuses because excuses are just reasons we tell ourselves why we cannot succeed before we even try. In this episode I teach you how to speak to yourself and change your mindset and wording in order to make sure that you never allow yourself to talk yourself out of pursuing something that you really want in life. Transcript

item.title: Ep 75 - Mastering Public Speaking | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Jon Vroman was voted the #1 college speaker in the United States 2x in a row and is the best public speaker that I have ever seen live. In this episode he talks about how to master the art of public speaking, whether you are brand new to it or a seasoned speaker. Transcript

item.title: Ep 74 - How to be More Productive | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Do you ever have a to do list that seems like it never ends, no matter how long you spend on it, it just keeps getting longer and longer? In this episode I talk about how to major in the majors and use the 80/20 rule to be more productive every single day. Transcript

item.title: Ep 73 - Interview w/ My First Mentor | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description In this episode I interview my very first mentor from when I was 19. We cover a ton of different mindset topics from taking unconditional responsibility of your life, the power of dreaming and how questions we ask ourselves determine our future. Transcript

item.title: Ep 72 - New Year's Resolutions Review | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description We are now in the first week of February, which means we have had one month to make progress on our goals and resolutions. In this episode I go over how to review your goals in order to make sure we do not fail at¬†achieving them and how to stay on track with hitting them. Transcript

item.title: Ep 71 - Why We Focus On The Negatives | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description It seems like every human is programmed to focus on the negatives more than the positives. The good part about that is we can also reprogram ourselves to focus on the positives and I cover how we can do that in this episode. Transcript

item.title: Ep 70 - Why You Don't Have What You Want | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description In this episode I talk about why you don’t have what you want and give you tips on how to break through your mental barriers in order to get and achieve what you desire. Transcript

item.title: Ep 69 - The Keys to Self Talk | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description The most important conversations you will ever have is the ones between your ears. In this episode I talk about the keys to positive self talk in order to get what we want in life. Transcript

item.title: Ep 68 - 10,000 Keys to $1 Million | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description If I gave you a 10,000 keys and said one key opens a door to $1 million would you try ever key to unlock that door? Yes, we all would! In this episode I talk about success, and how success leaves clues if you are willing to look for them. Transcript

item.title: Ep 67 - Learn When to Give Up | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description First of all - Don’t ever give up on your dreams. In this episode I talk about the value of knowing when to give up on the things that do not serve you anymore. Whether that be a job, relationship, friendships, etc. We must always know when it is good to give something or someone up in order to live the life that we truly want. Transcript

item.title: Ep 66 - Courage Speech w/ Jim Carrey | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Fears hold us back. Courage is the ability to face those fears and carry on towards our goal anyways. In this episode I share a clip of a speech that Jim Carrey gave and then give my thoughts on what we can take from this speech in order to be courageous and face our fears. Transcript

item.title: Ep 65 - Make Your Goals Visible | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description How are your New Year’s Resolutions going? Right about now is where people are realizing they are either on their way to achieving their resolutions or they have given up on them. Motivation can only come from within and one way to help you stay motivated is to constantly see and remind yourself of your goals. In this episode I speak about the importance of seeing your goals as often as possible and how to make your goals more visible.

item.title: Ep 64 - Distract Your Distractions | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Billionaires and bums all get the same amount of hours in each day. The difference between the two is how productive each are throughout every day. In this episode I teach you my 8 tips on how to distract your distractions to make sure each day is more productive, which will in turn help with your success. Transcript

item.title: Ep 63 - Progress, Not Perfection | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Many people suffer from “perfectionism” nowadays. We aren’t satisfied with what we do because we expect more from ourselves. The problem with that is our lack of perfection becomes an excuse for not finishing our goals. In this episode I talk about how the important thing is to focus on progress in order to combat our need to be perfectionists. Transcript

item.title: Ep 62 - Morning Rituals | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description In this episode I talk about morning rituals and why it is important to wake up earlier than needed to have time dedicated to yourself. Some of the most successful people in the world swear by waking up early and I wanted to share with you what rituals you could add to your morning routine. Transcript

item.title: Ep 61 - What If Money Was No Object? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description In this episode I play audio from one of my favorite philosophers named Alan Watts. He puts our lives into perspective and talks about why we should follow the money, but follow our passions. Then at the end I wrap it up with my thoughts on this issue. I made this episode in hopes that you will listen to it over and over again. Transcript

item.title: Ep 60 - Achievement is Addicting | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description We all have big goals and we all want to make our lives incredible. Sometimes our goals can scare us, though. The good news is that achievement is addicting - therefore it is important to start small with our goals, and hitting those small goals will help build our confidence. In this episode I talk about how starting small will help us hit our big goals. Transcript

item.title: Ep 59 - 75 Year Study on Happiness | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description In this episode I go over a 75 year Harvard study on the keys to human happiness. It is the longest single study on humans ever recorded and has some very interesting keys to living a happy life. Transcript

item.title: Ep 58 - How to Track Your Goals to Hit Them | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Pearson’s Law says “When performance is measured, performance improves. When performance is measured and reported back, the rate of improvement accelerates.“So in order to achieve our goals we MUST track them. If we want exponential achievement we must track our goals and then report them to someone else like an accountability partner. Transcript

item.title: Ep 57 - Motivation Doesn't Last | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Motivation does not last. It is fades away very easily. In this episode I speak about how to keep your motivation throughout the day and why it is so important to get motivation at least once a day. Transcript

item.title: Ep 56 - Enough Is Enough - How Much Will You Tolerate? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Your world will always be a reflection of what you are willing to tolerate - your happiness, success, bank account, health, relationships, everything. To make 2016 the year you really want it to be you must change your standards of what you are willing to tolerate. Transcript

item.title: Ep 55 - Who Moved My Cheese? - Embracing Change | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description The only thing constant in life is change. In this episode I talk about how to embrace and anticipate change in order to stay ahead of every one else and how it is described in a book called “Who Moved My Cheese?” Transcript

item.title: Ep 54 - "Brainwash" Yourself to Be Successful | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description We are in control of all the information we allow into our minds, therefore I am on a mission to “brainwash” myself with content to be successful. From reading books, listening to audio books, to listening to podcasts I am filling all of my time with content to help me be more successful. In this episode I tell you how you can as well. Transcript

item.title: Ep 53 - How to Practice Gratitude & Follow Your Passion w/ Brotha James | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Brotha James is a good friend of mine and also one of the most grounded people I know. We speak about a lot of different things in this episode but we really dive into practicing gratitude, as well as finding and following your passion and¬†how all of those can transform your life. Transcript

item.title: Ep 52 - I Got Layed Off | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description I was layed off from my job a couple weeks ago. In this episode I wanted to talk about my thought process as it was happening so you can see that I practice what I preach and also what I learned from the process that you can too. There is always a silver lining in every situation, you just have to look for it. Transcript

item.title: Ep 51 - Ask Rob Pt 2 & #MWFmission | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description In this episode I answer some questions asked by all of you. We speak about how to connect with the right people, believing in yourself, and how to chose the path that you are most passionate about.¬†Something I am passion about is giving back. That is why I started a hashtag for our community, it is #MWFmission because I end every episode with “Make it your mission to make somebody else’s day better.

item.title: Ep 50 - Energy Hacks | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description We all need more energy. I have spent a lot of time researching how to get the most out of each day and how to get a lot of energy each day consistently, day in and day out. In this episode I share some of the information that I have learned as well as products that I feel give me energy throughout the day.For links to the products I talk about in this episode go to MWFmotivation.

item.title: Ep 49 - How You Do One Thing is How You do Everything | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Most people feel it is okay to come up short on the little things in life as long as the finish the bigger things. In this episode we talk about the importance of giving a little bit extra and shooting for more than you planned, even on the little things in life. Because if you go over and above on the little things then you will execute your larger goals in life at a much higher level.

item.title: Ep 48 - Secrets to Getting Successful Mentors w/ Geoff Woods | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description We all know that we are the average of the five people that we spend the most time with. Geoff Woods runs The Mentee Podcast and has spent countless hours developing a system to surround himself with the most successful people that he can. In this episode he shares some of his secrets to networking, as well as secrets to get successful people to be your mentor. Transcript

item.title: Ep 47 - How To Manage Your Emotions | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description In this episode I talk about how when our emotions are running high, it is never the best idea for us to talk to someone else or make a decision. I dig into the concept of what it means by when emotions are high, logic is low and how you can use it in your every day life. Transcript

item.title: Ep 46 - Ask Rob - Questions From You | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Since starting this podcast, I have been getting a lot of emails where people ask for advice. I realized it would be more beneficial to answer these questions for others to hear.
