In this episode I give recommendations on my favorite books, talk about how to deal with negative people and give advice on how to find the best conferences for you to attend. If you want to ask me a question email me - Rob@MWFmotivation.

item.title: Ep 45 - Jump Start Your New Year's Resolutions | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Today is December 2nd, that means we have 29 days to get a jump start to our New Year’s Resolutions. In this episode I go over the 6 categories of resolutions and how to get a jump start on all of your goals so that you are already cranking on your goals by January 1st. Transcript

item.title: Ep 44 - Limitations Are Optional | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Limitations are optional. Almost everything that holds us back from our dreams are limitations and fears made up in our own minds. In this episode we talk about how to overcome limitations and rise above our fears in order to live the life of our dreams. Transcript

item.title: Ep 43 - The Most Important Person in Your Life | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description In this episode we talk about who the most important person should be in your life. We talk about the difference between those that you love the most and the one that should be the most important. Transcript

item.title: Ep 42 - People Are Either Vacuums or Chargers | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Some people are vacuums - they suck the energy out of you and spending time with them will wear you out. Other people are chargers - spending time with them fills you with energy and new outlooks in life. In this episode we talk about your Top 5 and why you want to fill it with the “Chargers” Transcript

item.title: Ep 41 - Are You a Lighthouse or a Tow Boat? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description In this episode we speak about how many people spend too much time as a tow boat - trying to pull people to¬†safety and using up their own energy in the process. Instead of being a tow boat, it is better to be the lighthouse - to be the best version of ourselves, live our lives to the fullest and shine as an example for others to follow.

item.title: Ep 40 - Mindset of a Millionaire w/ Ryan Moran | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description There are some people in this world that have he ability to expand your mindset with a single conversation, for me this was one of them. Ryan became a millionaire at 26, and since has grown multiple businesses to generate over a million dollars in sales per year. In this episode we speak about the mindset of a millionaire and how you can get there as well. Transcript

item.title: Ep 39 - How Reliable Are You? | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Integrity, trust and reliability. Those are all qualities that we want others to see in us. The problem is that we drop the ball in some places of our life, which makes us seem less reliable and trustworthy. In this episode we dive in to how to improve those key areas in order to be seen as an individual that can be counted on and trusted. Transcript

item.title: Ep 38 - Replace Worry With Action | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Worrying does nothing for us. We will all worry, it is part of life, but the key is to not let that worry cripple us and to take action in order to overcome that worry. In this episode we talk about how to overcome our worrying and take action towards the outcome we desire. Transcript

item.title: Ep 37 - How to Grow Your Bank Account | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Everyone wants a bigger bank account but most people don’t know that one of the fastest ways to grow their bank accounts is to focus on growing themselves first. In this episode Rob talks about how your bank account only grows when you personal development account has grown. Transcript

item.title: Ep 36 - Transform Your Health Through Technology w/ Josh Trent | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Josh Trent grew up in Section 8 housing while being fed through the welfare program. He is the perfect example that where you come from doesn’t have a say in how successful you will be.¬†In this episode he tells his incredible story of how he went from severely overweight, to getting into great shape, to now owning a very successful fitness company. Transcript

item.title: Ep 35 - The Phrase to Change Your Life | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description “Can’t change it” That is a phrase that can change your life. So often we let things out of our control stress us out. In this episode we talk about that phrase and how it helps us take control of our life and relax, even when times get stressful. Transcript

item.title: Ep 34 - AFFIRMATIONS: Today is Your Day | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Today is your day. In this episode we walk you through a motivational affirmation speech that we made for you to listen to every day, at the start of your day. Make today the best day of your life! Transcript

item.title: Ep 33 - Say Yes to EVERYTHING | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Saying no keeps us in our comfort zone and that will limit our experiences. If we want to do, experience and become more we must push ourselves out of our comfort zones.¬†In this episode Rob talks about his challenge to himself to say yes to everything and makes a challenge for you to do the same. Transcript

item.title: Ep 32 - Let Go of The Past & Create The Future You Desire | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description In order to create the future we desire we must first let go of the things in the past that may be holding us back. Hanging on to old memories or failures is like keeping an anchor attached to your sailboat as you sail away, you won’t go anywhere. In this episode we talk about why it is so hard to let go and move on and also give three easy steps that make it easier to let go.

item.title: Ep 31 - Success Made Simple: The One Thing w/ Jay Papasan | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description In this episode Rob interviews Jay Papasan, author of the best selling book “The One Thing” Jay speaks in depth about the six lies we tell ourselves that keep us from being successful. He also tells us why the happiest people in the world are always the ones who know their “one thing” and follow it with all their hearts. Transcript

item.title: Ep 30 - Commitment: The Backbone To Your Success | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description We all know commitment is one of the main keys to success. We never want to give up on our goals but that is easier said than done. In this episode we talk about commitment and give the keys to making sure we stay committed when things get tough. Transcript

item.title: Ep 29 - 10 Keys to a Successful Day | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description In this episode we cover and excerpt Dale Carnegie’s book “How to Stop Worrying and Start Living” called “Just For Today.” We cover the 10 steps for a successful day and make it a challenge to follow these steps, not just for today, but every day. Transcript

item.title: Ep 28 - How Appreciating The Little Things Leads To Happiness | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description We¬†are surrounded by so many amazing things in this world but we see them so often that we take them for granted. Einstein once said “There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle, the other is as though everything is a miracle.” In this episode we talk about how to appreciate the little things in life, and how when we learn to appreciate and be grateful for the little things, we can in turn find happiness.

item.title: Ep 27 - Overcoming Procrastination | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Procrastination is something we all do but wish we didn’t. In this episode we speak about why we procrastinate as well as the 5 tips to overcome procrastination. Transcript

item.title: Ep 26 - Living Up To Our Potential | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description How often do we really live up to our true potential? I mean 100% true potential. It is usually not as much as we should. We are more powerful than we give ourselves credit for and in this episode we talk about how to live up to our true potential and speak about what our lives could be like if we did. Transcript

item.title: Ep 25 - Living Life In The Front Row w/ Jon Vroman | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Jon Vroman is rated the #1 college speaker in America. He also runs a charity celebrating it’s 10 year anniversary this year called The Front Row Foundation. In this episode Jon talks about how to live your life in the front row. He speaks about how your environment directly affects your success and how living a life of giving is the happiest way to live. Transcript

item.title: Ep 24 - The Five Regrets of the Dying | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description In this episode we dive into the book “The Five Regrets of the Dying.” We speak about each regret and what we can learn from each in order to make sure we don’t look back and have any regrets when our time finally comes to leave this world. Transcript

item.title: Ep 23 - Overcoming Rejection | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Rejection can be tough. It can feel like a setback and sometimes even paralyze us, but in order to be successful we must realize that rejection is part of success. On the road to living the life of our dreams we will be rejected over and over again, so we must become okay with rejection and not let it hold us back. In this episode give tips on how to overcome rejection and how to psychologically set ourselves up to embrace rejection.

item.title: Ep 22 - Stop Saying "I Wish" & Start Saying "I Will" | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description It is time to take control of your life and stop making excuses. Whatever it is you want in this life you can have, you just need to have the mental fortitude to work hard for it and not allow yourself to make excuses. In this episode we speak about how the gym is a perfect metaphor for life and how you do one thing is how you do everything.

item.title: Ep 21 - Dive Into Fear | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Some people are frozen by their fear. The thing about fear is that we always worry about something that MIGHT happen in the future, and some times something completely out of our control. In this episode we talk about fear and give the top three tips to overcome your fear to make the life of your dreams. Transcript

item.title: Ep 20 -Take Action! | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description The first step is the hardest. We spend too much time planning and worrying, and not enough time just taking action. In this episode we talk about how to get started and “Just Do It” like Nike says. Successful people don’t spend all of their time planning, they take action and then plan. Transcript

item.title: Ep 19 - Believe in Yourself | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Believing in yourself is the first step on your road to success. You must believe in yourself before anyone else will. In this episode we speak about the importance of self talk¬†as well as three steps to help you believe in yourself if you don’t at the moment. We will also talk about something called “The Funeral For I Can’t” Transcript

item.title: Ep. 18 - The Power of Vulnerability Pt. 2 | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Embracing vulnerability. Vulnerability is a tough subject. As we get older we learn to close ourselves off and put our armor up, and not let ourselves be vulnerable so that we can’t get hurt. The problem with that is that in order to have true, deep relationships we need to be vulnerable and others need to be vulnerable. In this episode we talk about¬†the steps to being comfortable with, and learning to embrace, vulnerability.

item.title: Ep. 17 - The Power of Vulnerability Pt 1 | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Vulnerability is a tough subject. As we get older we learn to close ourselves off and put our armor up, and not let ourselves be vulnerable so that we can avoid getting hurt. The problem with that is that in order to have true, deep relationships we need to be vulnerable and others need to be vulnerable as well. In this episode we talk about what vulnerability is, why we hide from it, and the positives of allowing ourselves to be vulnerable.

item.title: Ep 16 - Decide What You Want | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description What do you want? In order to get everything you want from this life we must decide, in detail, what it is that we want in our life. Most people have an idea of what they want, but don’t have 100% clarity. In this episode we speak about finding and following your passion in order to have a happy life. Transcript

item.title: Ep 15 - My First Podcast Hater | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Haters are everywhere. They try to discourage you from being happy and from achieving anything great. In this episode we speak about the psychology of haters and how to deal with them when you encounter them on your road to achieving your dreams. Transcript

item.title: Ep. 14 - Losing My Alcoholic Father | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description My father died when I was 15, after years of being an alcoholic. I don’t have a memory of my father sober. Mike Abramowitz of G.R.A.B. Tomorrow asked if he could interview me for his upcoming book and we decided this would also be a good episode to publish. Although this is a longer than our typical episode, we speak about how no matter what happens in your life you have two choices - either you see yourself as a victim or you find a silver lining and learn from every negative.

item.title: Ep 13 - What Living on a Couch Teaches You | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Jake Bailey has an incredible mindset.After he lost everything, he ended up living in his office, sleeping on a couch in his office and showering at the local gym. Not once did he ever get down on himself during that time. He sees life as an adventure and that point in his life was just another road bump on his journey to success.¬†He now runs one of the most successful real estate offices in Florida and in this episode he shares his definition of a champion’s mindset.

item.title: Ep 12 - From Death to Success w/ Hal Elrod | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Hal Elrod died at 20 years old.He was brought back to life, spent 6 days in a coma and was told he would never walk again. He wouldn’t accept that fate and days later he would prove the doctors wrong and walk on his own.In this episode Hal shares what it took for him to have the mindset to not only overcome such a traumatic experience, but to go on to write a book called “The Miracle Morning” which hit the best sellers list and started a movement across the world.

item.title: Ep. 11 - Follow Your Passion w/ Zack Sexton | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description ‚ÄúThe two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.‚ÄùIn this episode Rob & Dean interview Zach Sexton of The Productivity Show Podcast. He takes us through his unique journey and his mindset of how he approaches life. He started off as a school teacher and eventually quit that to follow HIS PASSION which is teaching others to become their most productive self through some his many efficiency practices.

item.title: Ep 10 - The Power of Belief | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description You can literally do anything you set your mind to.In this episode we speak about the power of belief and knowing that you can achieve what you set your mind to. We also talk about psychological governors and self limiting beliefs that people place on themselves and how to break through them. Transcript

item.title: Ep 9 - Your Network Determines Your Net Worth | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description “Surround yourself with people who dream bigger than you do.“In this episode we talk about the importance of your surrounding yourself with the right people who will push and encourage you to your goals. We go over your “Top 5” and also go over the best ways to network to build up your circle of influence. Transcript

item.title: Ep. 8 - Self Respect & The Impostor Syndrome | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description “The only respect that matters is self respect"In this episode we talk about getting rid of your self limiting beliefs. We also speak about something called the “impostor syndrome” which is a psychological phenomenon in which people are unable to internalize their accomplishments. Transcript

item.title: Ep. 7 - Expect Nothing From No One & Live Your Purpose | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description “Invest in yourself, expect nothing from no one and be willing to work for everything.“In this¬†episode Rob & Dean speak about the importance in investing your time, money and energy into your life’s purpose.¬†If you are unsure of what your life’s purpose may be, they also speak about how to search for it. The truth is that no one will care about your success more than you, so work for what you want and live a fulfilled life.

item.title: Episode 6 - Goals: Make a Plan & Develop Actions Steps | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description It is time to make a plan and execute that plan. In this episode we cover what you may have to give up in order to achieve your goals. We will also develop a plan on how to achieve your goals and teach you how to schedule it and how to use your planner(in the book). Lastly, we will talk about self discipline and how to overcome any procrastination that may come along yout journey.

item.title: Episode 5 - Goal Setting: Determining your WHY & developing your mission statement | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description The key to staying motivated on the journey to your goals is to have a strong WHY. It is what will keep you going when times get tough, and show you why you are really pursuing a goal. In this episode we will talk about what your life could like if you do not hit your goals and then we will go over what your life will look like when you do hit your goals.

item.title: Episode 4 - Goal Setting: How to | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description We cover the most successful way to set goals in this episode and the importance of writing down your goals. We will cover 5 out of the 10 subjects in our eBook - relationships, personal growth, finances, spirituality and career.¬†Follow me on IG here: @RobDialJr https://instagram.com/robdialjr Transcript

item.title: Episode 3 - Honest Reflection | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Before we conquer our future goals we must first look back and do an honest reflection of how well we have done with past goals - where we have succeeded and where we have fallen short. In this episode, we will cover relationships, personal growth, spirituality, finances, and career goals. Follow me on IG here: @RobDialJr https://instagram.com/robdialjr Transcript

item.title: Episode 2: Take Control of Your Life & Mind | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Your life is 100% your fault. Sounds harsh but how you react to everything is your decision and therefore your fault. In this episode Rob teaches steps to taking control of your life and mind, controlling your mindset when times get tough and how to find the silver lining in every circumstance. Life is not what happens to you, but how you react to it. This is from¬†Follow me on IG here: @RobDialJr https://instagram.

item.title: Episode 1: Habits of Successful People | The Mindset Mentor
item.description: Podcast Description Here we speak about the habits of all successful people. In order to become successful, we must copy the habits of other successful people. We speak about waking up early, health, work ethic, as well as other habits that we can create in order to start on our journey to becoming successful.¬†Follow me on IG here: @RobDialJr https://instagram.com/robdialjr Transcript
